author: {'steamid': '76561199099941854', 'num_games_owned': 60, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1701458534}
review:
Очень разочарован. Задумка и персонажи интересные, это был бы вполне нормальный файтинг если бы не то что зайти в игру самому по себе оч сложно, экран разширен неприятно (ну ладно это можно исправить хотя бы), а вот подключение джойстика просто отвратное. Джойстик у меня от пс и всё бы по логике должно работать отлично, но при заходи в игру кнопки перестают работать либо же в другом случае быстро перематываються и кликают сами ( в любой другой игре такого не было). Также иногда вообще не работает музыка не смотря на наличия джойстика.

Ладно забудем про технические проблемы (допустим вам удалось их обойти или исправить) и перейдем к игровым проблемам. При входе в игру (битву) выход обратно просто отсутствует до окончания её. Пиксельная графика в меню часто режит глаза ( не сами пиксель арты, а в буквально МЫЛО которое увеличено в 5 раз). Сама история была бы интересной если бы не было такой ультра урезано быстрой, такое чувство что на персонажей ушло больше бюджета чем на саму оптимизацию и продумку игры и я не удивлюсь если всё так и было. 

Ну вообщем мой итог что игра для лютых терпил которые будут сидеть и терпеть все эти баги и шакалы ради минутки файтинга. Не советую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003755823', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 58, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1700757874}

review:
Jogo de luta com gráficos muito bonitos, desenhados à antiga. É um pouco básico, não tendo modo de história ou campanha. É só mesmo versus com muita porrada. E o modo fullscreen é um pouco estranho, não é um verdadeiro fullscreen, o que pode estragar o AR.

author: {'steamid': '76561198866178565', 'num_games_owned': 164, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1694965202}
review:
Игра порадовала плавными анимациями и отличным визуалом ( Разве что фоны немного дробноваты, но всё равно рассматривать их одно удовольствие). Из минусов можно отметить только отсутствие настроек. 
Если хотите поиграть онлайн нужно купить отдельное dlc, но учитывая низкую стоимость данного файтинга это не является существенной проблемой (особенно на распродаже).

author: {'steamid': '76561198049278576', 'num_games_owned': 235, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 180, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 180, 'last_played': 1688492098}
review:
O jogo pode ter artes muito boas e atraentes, seleção de personagens até ampla (pelo tamanho do jogo), inúmeras músicas, mas os elogios param por aqui e os pontos negativos pesam mais do que os positivos.

Desinstalei há muito tempo porque o jogo parou simplesmente de reconhecer os controles, tornando-o impossível de jogar e descobri que não fui o único a ter o mesmo problema. Se você der sorte de algum controle funcionar (para mim não funciona nem o teclado!) a jogabilidade era mais para menos do que para mais, esquisitinha e travada, mas te mantém entretido por algumas dezenas de horas e só.

Ao revisitar em pleno 2023 para ver se consertaram esse bug grave, para a minha surpresa, CONTINUA A MESMA COISA de 2018! Dá a impressão que o(s) desenvolvedor(es) simplesmente nem liga para o que está sendo vendido aqui no Steam.
A propósito, continua o problema de escala de janela e tela cheia. Não é de se esperar, visto que o jogo foi construído numa engine mais velha que a descoberta do fogo!
Outra coisa que descobri recentemente é que há suporte para Oficina, mas desde 2015 não existe conteúdo até a data deste review.

Este jogo precisa seriamente ser refeito porque é vergonhoso da forma que está e é cheio de problemas. É uma pena mas passe longe, ele não vale um centavo sequer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037451110', 'num_games_owned': 249, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 293, 'last_played': 1685062727}

author: {'steamid': '76561198148993687', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 119, 'playtime_forever': 362, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 362, 'last_played': 1675131707}
review:
You know when a friend tells you some scary paranormal experience and then all out of the sudden your brain clicks and you start to remember similar things that were blocked to protect your mental sanity?
Well i keep having the same with this trash game, my brain blocked it so i stop suffering, then i end up reinstalling it again years later because i don't remember how bad it was. By the time i write this review maybe in  2 years i'll install it again and forget how waste of space this game is.

Apparently i had 6 hours playing this garbage, might be just to get the cards or something. Must be it, for some reason i have a background of the only character that seem to be made for adults and not a pedobear friendly waifu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198330137800', 'num_games_owned': 362, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 1515, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 548, 'last_played': 1686518268}
review:
Don't buy this game, and it's not because of the game it's just theeigoMANGA STOLE the original creator and here is a little what an adm from discord was write "First off: EigoManga IS NOT the original dev nor original publisher of Vanguard Princess. The real Dev behind VanPri  is Tomoaki Sugeno AKA Suge9.
He's a supposed ex-Capcom employee, created the game in 2008 & put it for free on his blog. He updated it for a while: adding moves and making balance changes, before disappearing from the web.". So if u like the game just download the original full version (it's free btw).

review: Esse jogo tem uma qualidade de animação muito boa para um jogo indie, ( Deve ficar muito bonito em uma TV de tubo, o formato da tela do jogo  é quadrada não full screem )   infelizmente possui uma jogabilidade muito simples, é mais divertido jogar contra outro player do que contra a máquina, pois ela espama o mesmo botão várias vezes ( inclusive você pode fazer isso se quiser ) , meu arcade não funcionou nele, talvez tenha que usar aqueles programas que fazem leitura dos botões do teclado, mas o controle funcionou de boa, o jogo é baratinho e leve.

author: {'steamid': '76561198117280491', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 117, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 117, 'last_played': 1543782241}
review:
ABANDONADO COM PROBLEMAS SEM SOLUÇÃO.

Pessoal, eu sei que esse jogo enche os olhos na página da loja, mas antes de comprar tenham em mente que esse jogo foi abandonado e seus problemas não serão sanados.
Problemas:
O que mais me incomoda são os controles que não reconhecem e temos que usar o Xinput ou similares, os gráficos são bem ruins não vou passar pano não a arte pode ser bem desenhada mas do que adianta se você as vê em 800x600, sério a resolução é bem ruim e não tem como arrumar nas configurações e ainda por cima não da nem pra por em tela cheia, eu jogava em janela bem pequena mesmo com o youtube do lado vendo videos e eu to falando sério.
A primeira coisa que vai notar é que o jogo claramente não está acabado e cara que sensação ruim pra quem gastou dinheiro nisso, por menor que seja o valor a sensação é ruim igual, e para terminar as personagens nenhuma prendeu a minha atenção e a história desse jogo por mais que tenha um tom bem legal misturando magia com futuro distópico ainda sim consegue ser bem esquecível, tenho sim pouco tempo de jogo e não pretendo ter mais não.

review:
This is an amazing and underrated game.
But.
Why don't you work on screen ratio adaptation, interface and resolution?
You can't learn the Capcom way, at least you can follow the SNK.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061606765', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1655836606}
review: Way too busy and too much going on, you got no time to figure out how to play or comprehend the situation before you are wailed on again and again leaving you to just button mash and hope. Just another fighting game that is all graphics and flash but no substance. Pass.

author: {'steamid': '76561198824039683', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1653768850}
review: Si bien se ve lindo con el diseño de personajes, escenarios y algunos efectos en ataques, creo que casi nada mas tiene para destacar, la resolución es de 640x480 aproximadamente, y si lo pones en pantalla completa, la imagen se estira mucho y se pixela. Si tenes experiencia haciendo combos en juegos como BlazBlue, Undernight in Birth, Street Fighter, Melty Blood, etc., en este juego no vas a poder realizar combos medianamente decentes tan fácilmente, ya que tiene su propio estilo de juego que no se parece a casi ningún otro, es prácticamente indispensable usar las asistencias para hacer combos, y como no se mueven 100% al mismo ritmo que tu personaje, es decir, si te adelantas rápidamente por el escenario y tu asistencia quedó atrás, cuando le ordenes atacar, su golpe no alcanzará al oponente y tu combo fallará, sin contar muchas otras situaciones que suceden normalmente en un juego de peleas, y si te tomas un tiempo para aprender a hacer combos, ya sea una semana o un mes, al final te vas a encontrar jugando solo o sola porque en el online no hay nadie. Si lo querés para jugar solo o sola, ni para eso vale la pena, pero si aun así lo compras, tratá de disfrutarlo porque esta complicado hacerlo

author: {'steamid': '76561198332581380', 'num_games_owned': 249, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77, 'last_played': 1646557315}
review:
Personally I don't like it very much
Combat is pretty limited, I mean it feels nice to pull off combos and all but just the selection of moves is kinda of meh tbh.
 
And hey, I like anime girls as much as the next guy and I enjoy the aesthetic quite a bit, but all of these characters just seem like the most basic of anime girl archetypes. They have a personality for sure, but it's a personality that I've seen done a million times in shonen anime.

The animation is pretty good and you can tell they put a lot of effort into making these characters look appealing, but there are some minor gripes I have with it.

First off, everything is just too loud visually, there's so much going on that a lot of the time I just can't flat out tell what my character is doing. Also, contributing to that specific problem is the lack of separation between the main characters and the secondary characters. 
Most of the time the secondary characters just get in the way and clutter up the screen, thus making it harder to keep up with what's going on.

Another thing is the UI, most of it's alright, but one specific thing that I despise about is the fact that instead of having a menu to go to and chose to get back to the main menu screen, you have to press a button combination that doesn't register easily. (Said button combination is START + A + B + X + Y) I'm sure you can understand why it would be irritating to some.
I can't speak too much on the online UI considering I couldn't get it to work.

Despite all of this there's definitely a solid game here, And hey, if you just want a fighting game with an all female cast that uses that cutesy/sexy anime girl aesthetic, then you'll probably be able to overlook it's faults.

I only played it for a couple hours, but the above reasons I have stated are why I got a refund.

review: 有点鸡肋的格斗游戏，游戏没法全屏，手柄支持的也不太好，没有练习模式，AI难度也高得离谱，被普通难度AI血虐，但是又有着相当好看的人物造型和比较完备的格斗系统。初玩还是挺有意思的，就是不知道能玩多久了。

author: {'steamid': '76561199021756934', 'num_games_owned': 62, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1505, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 444, 'last_played': 1703738150}
review: Visuals are great, and the game is overall pretty fun for the price. That is if you have friends. Story mode isn't even really a story, and most of the AIs only spam attacks, which in this game can get very, VERY annoying. Especially the final boss of the story mode, who is on a whole other level of cheese. I'm talking absolutely filled to the brim with cheese. The final boss is a playable character, and trust me, she is stupid broken. While the game is generally very visually appealing, the inputs can be very weird and hard to pull off. Like pointing your directional stick to the left, then doing a half circle and back, then hitting the attack button. All this while fighting an AI that doesn't even have to worry about the wacky directional inputs. If the developers broadcast the game to this day, they should probably update the game and it's very OP AI.

author: {'steamid': '76561198970753970', 'num_games_owned': 460, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1641741182}
review:
I am a fightygame noob, and here are the things to consider
1. This game goes on MASSIVE sales of -80%, being already cheap - in director's cut, which does give the DLC characters
2. [b]You can set up the controls for local multiplayer on same keyboard![/b]
3. The game lacks tutorial mode and a lot of other ingame conveniences
4. (SUBJECTIVE) Balance feels off to me
5. Story is very lacking

THAT SAID, for a budget pick and to have fun with friends in local multiplayer it is quite good, and has unique advantages if you are extra broke and can't get a set of joysticks/fightsticks due to money or supply issues.

You can get it completely free - I encourage you to check out other reviews for details on this and how to do online multiplayer, if you want to know how much of a hassle that is

author: {'steamid': '76561198804937641', 'num_games_owned': 437, 'num_reviews': 203, 'playtime_forever': 377, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 365, 'last_played': 1634006544}
review:
[b]As Sages say ~ Not everything that is made of pixels and has b00bs is good...[/b]

[b]-[/b] The game is free from the publisher, but you must buy game on Steam.
[b]-[/b] The game opens in a small window and running in full screen does not allow for any resolution changes.
[b]-[/b] The game has no options, so you won't change the volume level or even quit the game, you can't even minimize game.
[b]-[/b] The game has hopeless keyboard / pad settings.
[b]-[/b] No campaign or story mode.
[b]-[/b] Only two game modes.
[b]-[/b] Only a few characters to choose from.

[b]Sages will always wonder how Vanguard Princess received so many positive ratings...[/b]

[i]I have a lot of games, not many of them really disappointed me and this Vanguard Princess is one of the worst I've ever played.[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198343569345', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1633620067}
review:
Vanguard Princess is a classic dojin anime fighter with some of the best hand drawn, hi-res pixel art and animation you'll ever find (Even more impressive when you realize it was all done by a single person.) If you're into fighters, fan service, or just good pixel art, this is definitely worth the price of admission, but there are several caveats that need to be noted.

The game lacks a "true" fullscreen option. Putting it in fullscreen stretches the aspect ratio and also blurs the pixel art (and not decently either.) Equally grating is that roughly two years ago the game stopped recognizing ALL of my gamepads. I'm not sure if this is the case for everybody, but from reading the Steam discussions, this has happened to quite a few of us, the publisher posted some workarounds, but none of them have worked for me. Fortunately, I WAS able to get my gamepad working through the free (and tiny) 3rd party program Joy2key. 

In playing Vanguard Princess in 2021 it feels like the game itself is on life support. I have dreams that one day it can be upgraded to a new engine, but until then I'm honestly just glad to be able to play it at all.

author: {'steamid': '76561198384351293', 'num_games_owned': 1186, 'num_reviews': 729, 'playtime_forever': 307, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 307, 'last_played': 1520404460}

author: {'steamid': '76561198005475322', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1632022655}
review: Saying this game has "partial controller support" is like saying Final Fantasy 7 is multiplayer because you can pass the controller. Arrow keys, enter, and space bar will NOT be joining our quest to find the options as fast as possible so I can play a few rounds in time to refund this game. Also, I didn't realize that this "game" runs off of a type of integrated windows software that I had to install. I stumbled into a match somehow and the animation is gorgeous, but overall, I can't accept this as anything more than an experimental project. Sorry.

author: {'steamid': '76561198136538628', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 138, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1706353782}
review: Joguei esse jogo na versão beta e até hoje recomendo esse jogo pra qualquer um, fez parte da minha infância. é um ótimo jogo pra passar o tempo e é bem feito, só queria que tivesse suporte para resoluções mais altas de hoje em dia, como 1080p e 4k / widescreen / ultrawide. author: {'steamid': '76561199098717275', 'num_games_owned': 102, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 1197, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 978, 'last_played': 1636845991}
review:
Resumo: um dead or alive da vida pra tentar roubar seu dinheiro ou também conhecido como um hentão da vida pra também tentar roubar seu dinheiro. Resumindo a prenderam com a EA GAMES.

Cara pra começo de conversa tô triste em fazer essa análise até pq o joguin é bão é se for comprar ( compra o jogo inicialmente é se pá umas DLC de musiquinhas pq a soundtrack é bão ) ou se compro é está com dúvida se deveria comprar outras dlc's pro jogo? Bem eu vou explicar, mas antes n sou um hater do jogo até pq o joguin é bão é tô fazendo essa crítica pra caras de pau dos caras ( nem tanto). o quê fode é o que eu vou explicar agora. Pra começo de conversa que não tem um Brazilian ( ptbr ) ou até mesmo um espanholzito gostoso no azeite pra quem não manja dos inglês, mas até aí beleza tu pode me dizer q é um jogo de luta sem muito foco na história é talls, até agora tá safe o quê me fode é fode bastante o  meu cool é essas dlc. É não por ser caras, pelo contrário por ser caro é ser broken, no caso eu estou falando da DLC online dexlune, caso tu seja o cara dos onlines é senta o dedo em todo mundo, PA RA BÉ NS pra jogar o modo online tu tem q comprar todas as DLC de personagens ( É ISSO É DE FUDE PÁ GARAIO JÁ QUE EM OUTROS JOGOS DO GÊNERO TU PODE TER OU NÃO A DLC QUE TU JOGA MSM ASSIM O ONLINE, MAS ESSE JOGO É EXCESSÃO?? ), mas rlx q eu ainda n cheguei no fundo caso tu curte uns designer é talls passe longe da DLC Digital Cômico Séries, é sério vai por mim. Tu paga 6,49 ( no meu caso 3,24 pq peguei na promo tlg ) é só vem 33 arte é 3 ""mangás", ó tempo q tu leva pra ler é menor do que a sua ejaculação precoce, E ainda por cima das 33 arts só 15 ou 18 ( tô sendo generosa ) se salvam. É estão alternando entre médio é alto. Mas o resto só Jesus na causa é pura deslexia na mão, só pôde. Até um chipanzé cracukudo e com parkinson faz mais bonito. é de 6 conto tu leva 33 arts. Do mínimo do mínimo tu deveria receber 100 arts é mangás um pouco mais longo.... Enfim vou parar por aqui até pq ainda tô fazendo as outras dlc's é SIM EU PAGUEI TODAS AS DLCS É AGORA TO  SÓ NA RAIVA E DECEPÇÃO pq sou uma trouxa. Mas quando eu terminar as outras dlc's eu volto é adiciono se realmente vale a pena comprar pq essas 2 q eu citei passa longe amigo (a).

author: {'steamid': '76561198445793613', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1653653997}
review:
I genuinely bought this game by accident but fell in love with it

Its a classic japanese arcade fighter thats 2 on 2, you got your main character and a support character. There is a few characters to try out and inputs are pretty difficult to learn at first, but its managable! If i could compare Vanguard Princess to some other modern fighting game, it feels very much like Guilty Gear, both happen to be japanese.

7/10 for the difficulty/fun ratio, amazing characters and a lot of nsfw outfits.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016046767', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1614, 'playtime_forever': 586, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 586, 'last_played': 1629342766}
review:
You don't get a story, or any real kind of campaign mode. There isn't a ton of point to it other than to clobber your enemy. There is no git gud multiplayer community to join up with.

But what you do get is waifus beating on each other for little to no reason using some solid fighting mechanics. It's pretty entertaining!

author: {'steamid': '76561198993791440', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 1665, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 557, 'last_played': 1642199802}
review: The game is gorgeous, and has interesting play. Me, as a Luna main, really like the dynamic of the stances. But. I play with keyboard all fighting games. I have no problem playing this game. If you are normal, you probably won't have the chance to play this properly. Even if you get to play, buffers are very much screwed (you can't combo some special moves out of normals. And I'm talking jumping heavy + shoryuken). Multiplayer doesn't even come with the base version. Menus are wacky. In summary, if you like the aesthetic go for it, I think it's enjoyable. But the state in which it was left is not appropriate for playing,

review:
Vanguard Princess is a interesting manga aesthetic looking fighting game..

Pros
1. Arcade Mode, ETC
2. Great character design and animations

Cons
1. Game can be very repetitive at time
2. Lack Characters 
3. Control can be tricky sometimes

Overall: Vanguard Princess is a great game but far from perfect.

review:
게임소스는 가능성을 많이 함유하고있으나 게임자체는 어디가서 돈받고 팔아먹을 수준은 절대로 아님
높은평가와 싼가격에 혹시나하고 관심가는 사람을 위해 덧으로 작성하자면 
화면비율조정도 없고 인터페이스도 형편없는 말그대로 편의성이 완전 꽝인 무료배포용 동인게임 그이상 그이하도 아닌 수준의 게임이라는거
개인적으로 할인하는 게임마다 골라서 구입하는 편인데도 불구하고 얼마안되는 돈 아까운건 이 게임이 처음임

author: {'steamid': '76561198873597577', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 677, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 528, 'last_played': 1642826753}
review:
Sorry pero no puedo recomendar este juego. 

Si lo que buscas es puro fan service, este juego cumple y bien. Pero, como juego de peleas la verdad deja mucho que desear. Personajes planos y poco carismáticos, combos casi que nulos, un sistema de "strikers" poco novedoso y mal implementado. 

Repito, como juego de fan service está bien. Pero si lo que quieres es un buen juego clásico de peleas, mejor ahorra para comprar un Street fighter o un KOF. Mucho mejores opciones que ésta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198974108440', 'num_games_owned': 112, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 351, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 351, 'last_played': 1607369708}
review:
+ Fast paced decent fighting game
+ Cute anime girl (for the pervs into that stuff, me included)
+ Sometimes funny (well quirky anime humour)

- Full screen is not good, if not functional
- No story gave me no investment in any character
- Feels like a bare bone game in which you gotta invest more (and screw that)

Maybe if you are big on anime fighting games it is worth the 5 bucks but for me even with a hefty discount was still not the thing to pull me in.

author: {'steamid': '76561198868746123', 'num_games_owned': 62, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 949, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 310, 'last_played': 1619545105}
review:
So, i just want to say that, the game itself isn't the worst, and it for sure isn't the best either, the layout is bad and confusing, some characters are very in-balanced, their is only 2 modes, which aren't made great either.

The roster consists of 10 main characters and 5 support characters; the support characters are very annoying because they stay on the back(ground) of the character, which sometimes makes it pretty confusing, apart from that, it is an interesting mechanic but for sure could have been implemented better. 

Once again, some characters are more imbalanced than others, the learning curve is pretty high, so i do recommend staying off the game of you are looking for a casual anime fighter.

There were a lot of problems outside of the game itself as well; the game feels stretched out, because it was originally an arcade game and for square type screens, but you can get used to it after a few hours. Some controllers don't work for the game and the controls and how you can view them etc, is very weird to use.

The game has no story, and there is not really a training mode; does not show you how the game works (at least properly).

Vanguard princess is pretty grind-y, and has a high skill curve, the sprites and graphics are not great,SOME backgrounds are really annoying/not great(though some are actually very nice), the voice acting is fine; nothing special. The UI and Menus are usually pretty confusing.

DO NOT buy the online deluxe DLC, it is not made completely correct, and could be confusing to use, plus, almost no-one plays the game for Online or the game itself in general, it is not worth it.

The boss are very annoying, grindy and really hard to beat. The story line is...basically non-existent haha.

So, in conclusion:

Unless you like 90's type fighting games, grinding, and fan-service type games, i really dont recommend the game,
If you are thinking if you should buy DLC of the characters, play the game and see if you are bored of it quickly, if so, the DLC isnt much better BUT if you do like it, do try getting the DLC, likely on sale ;D



I hope this helps,

But the main game when it is on discount, and that should be the worth the money!!!
If you do get it, i Hope you have fun!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198283533381', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 135, 'last_played': 1529015143}
review: 그냥 평범하게 팬티보는 격투게임

author: {'steamid': '76561198045987070', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 459, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 284, 'last_played': 1625898650}
review:
this game is really fun and you should play it
HOWEVER. 

if you paid for this game at all, you paid too much for it. the original developer of this game released it for free on his blog as a personal project before  stopping after a few balance patches. There are reasons to believe that this game was taken without his permission, among those being that:

1.) Each "dlc" unlocks another standalone version of the game with whatever character that you bought. The game was never coded with dlc in mind. 

2.) multiple moves were either removed or "adjusted", creating balance issues and frame data inconsistencies.

3.) training mode is busted to hell. it's just a 3 round match with an AI that sits there. No infinite meter, no instant assist meter, nothing.

The game's fun, and if you trust the publisher to reimburse the creator I'd probably say you should pay for it, but otherwise I'd recommend looking for an alternative way to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198272708175', 'num_games_owned': 531, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 153, 'last_played': 1615703969}
review:
Don't get me wrong, the original game is nice, but eigoMANGA really botched this version of the game and they seem more interested in making a mobile game and adding useless extras not worth your time or money. Their comic book is awful and has weird political messages in it.
The UI is as primitive as it comes. It really looks like a high school project made with an archaic computer and the resolution is laughable.

The only good thing you can get from this is the soundtrack. That's the only thing I'm keeping after I uninstall this waste of a good game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198136486029', 'num_games_owned': 1681, 'num_reviews': 140, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1615572348}
review: For anime fans, this is a complete disappointment. The idea of ​​the game was noticed, but a weak fighting game, problematic management. I leave it in the collection for collecting cards.

author: {'steamid': '76561198258064611', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1615078398}
review: Sincèrement, même 1 euros 79 était trop pour ce "jeu". Il y a deux modes, histoire et versus. Bon pourquoi pas, les devs connaissent pas les options ni l'entraînement, passons. Premier niveau : Entraînement. Pardon ? Bon, on va dire c'est leur logique, pourquoi pas. Deuxième niveau : Euh j'ai pris "Facile" pour commencer et m'entraîner un peu, donc facile c'est : Prise, Prise, Prise, Prise (Changeons un peu), Prise, Prise, Prise. En vrai j'abuse, au bout de 4 prises t'es déjà mort, alors que l'ennemi après 20 coups dispose d'encore toute sa vie. Je commence à songer réellement le remboursement, même pour 1/6ème de kebab. Une galette, c'est bon, ça.

author: {'steamid': '76561198097123877', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 961, 'playtime_forever': 271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 271, 'last_played': 1614116950}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198347304669', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1610705971}
review:
[h1] NOPE!! Thank you! [/h1]

Feels like an anime-fighter running on an emulator. It opens up in its own window that you can F4 to fullscreen, but then you miss out on all the fun things like configuring your controls for gamepads, sticks and keyboard controls. They are not present in game.

However many different types of gamepads or sticks you try to make this game work with, it will defeat you. You cannot map direction keys for gamepads and sticks.
[u] You can however map the same keyboard bindings for both P1 and P2. Start a versus match and let the hilariousity unfold. [/u]

There is only story mode and versus mode on the main menu. The game then decides to lag on the character select screen. There is significant delay in switching/changing characters.

Once I started a match I could not, for the love of me, find a way to get back to the main menu. Restarted.
Again after a couple of matches, the screen went black and I had to force close it. [spoiler] Restarted? NO!! [/spoiler]

The waifu-fighters are alright, but the "semi-familiars" that you have in this game seem to be scantily clad kids. Oki?

Then they have the audacity to have paid DLCs for this broken-bum piece of cwap. I got all them blazblue and guilty gear titles cheaper than this omelette aux ordures, and they are better games.

PAID DLC ONLINE PLAY?  GFY!!!

The gameplay is nice though, but the other things are so glaringly gamebreaking and bad, that this game does not earn a recommendation.

PS: The in-game time you see was mostly trying to figure out what is what and how to exit the game without clicking on the big red X button; and two matches.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005931842', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 801, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 216, 'last_played': 1609698502}
review:
隐藏招式，测试出其他的再补充：
1）lilith 喷火 263c
2）haede  耗气必杀 2424b+c
3) hurumi 空中特殊技 282a ；伙伴必杀技 214b or 22b；伙伴超必杀 236 b+c+d
4) natalia 360 投以后再接236a/b/c可增加伤害；236突进中22可取消，可以快速输入2684逆时针转圈来在突进中施展投技；236b+c必杀第三击也可以22取消。

顺便一提，退出到开始界面是暂停后a+b+c，指令表是错的。

现在不推荐，原因是作者很不用心，saki的236b+c浊流斩击的动画自从1.08版以后就一直缺失，又不是什么大毛病都多少年了还不改？

author: {'steamid': '76561199088438846', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1609191894}
review:
Este juego tiene algunos problemas. No tiene un comando de opciones dentro del juego, tienes que cambiar las opciones con el cursor en la superficie de arriba de la pantalla, entre las que se encuentran número de rounds, tipo de escenario y tiempo. No tiene buena resolución en pantalla completa. El juego ofrece dos opciones para jugar antes de empezar. El normal y el online. De nuevo la falta de configuración de opciones dentro del juego se nota. No me deja conectarme al online. Mi idea es que el juego fue planificado con otro concepto pero que termino siendo un juego de peleas, que resulta sumamente lamentable que muestren esta calidad... en pleno 2012.

En una pelea, literal la IA y yo estábamos dando combos al aire esperando que alguno conectase. No es un juego que tiene un buen competitivo u opciones o extras. Esta solo para pasarlo bien, creo que si le hubiesen dedicado más tiempo algunas opciones hubieran quedado mejor. Si alguno todavía lo quiere comprar, le recomiendo que lo pille en oferta, o mejor que no lo haga. Hay varios otros juegos que dan mejor calidad o fanservice

review: Don't buy this game, it's a buggy version of a freeware game. You can read a short explanation on the issues [url=https://wiki.gbl.gg/w/Vanguard_Princess] here [/url] and if you want a more lengthy explanation I would suggest joining the community Discord server (link on the right of the earlier linked page) which has a channel dedicated to explaining the various problems.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021433778', 'num_games_owned': 1034, 'num_reviews': 3724, 'playtime_forever': 371, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1614687795}
review:
[h1]인디 격투게임. 메이저회사에서 만든 격투게임하고 비교하면 안된다는건 알고 있는데...[/h1]

인디라는 한계를 보여준다. 아주 대단한 분 한분이 이 게임을 만든걸로 알고 있는데
메이저 회사에서 만든것을 직전에 플레이 하다가 이걸 플레이 하게되면..... 말이 안나온다.

팬티를 보여주기는 하지만 격투파트에서 아무래도 좋은 점수를 주기는 어렵다. 메이저 제작사와 비교하면 말이다.


내가 지금까지 해 본 인디 격투게임 중에서는 퀸오브하트를 가장 최고로 쳤는데 이제부터는 이 Vanguard Princess다.
[b]리뷰상 추천하나[/b] 메이저 회사의 격투게임으로 격투게임을 보는 눈이 올라가신 분은 이걸 플레이하면 좋은점수를 주기 어려울거다.

[h1]누가 사겠다면 뭐라 하지는 않겠는데.[/h1]
나에게 이 게임은 사놓고 더는 안하는 게임에 추가될거 같음.

author: {'steamid': '76561198099012387', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 34948, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34946, 'last_played': 1605471342}
review:
I only used this as a slot for another game, but it's actually a fairly competent fighting game in its own right, and some of the characters are pretty unique in how they play. Almost all of it is weeb overload but the gun girl and the boss girl are pretty hot and the gun girl is pretty interesting to play. It has various technical issues and it's not modernized in various ways and so seems more dated than it actually is, but it's still a fairly quality fighting game.

If you like anime or are a fan of the genre, yeah I think it's pretty fair.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068174012', 'num_games_owned': 690, 'num_reviews': 385, 'playtime_forever': 361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 361, 'last_played': 1604568230}
review:
Vanguard Princess (2014)

Choose from one of ten anime girls to fight with and you can pick a tag partner to help you out as you fight. Each character got their own fighting style and combos. The story is fine as well. So if you like anime girls fighting each other, you might enjoy this title.

7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198447956293', 'num_games_owned': 350, 'num_reviews': 298, 'playtime_forever': 157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1607655181}
review:
worth the price I can tell you that. For 2 hours I tried to learn the moves, so far, even if the move-list is in the game I only know how to do the normal moves. None of the moves work at all. I tried with both my keyboard, my side keyboard, fight stick and controller...I also had no way to go back to the menu, Online mode didn't work at all and only story mode works (but story mode ain't that fun when the bots don't even know how to play and end up just spamming a move that leaves you on the floor. Really i didn't even get one hit in half of the time) 

I wanna like this game and for a bit I have fun, I just cant find myself liking it when half of the stuff in-game is broken. From what others are saying its due to an update but if that the case then I will remove this unless someone can give me a (better) move list or someway to change settings in-game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198363066593', 'num_games_owned': 162, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1664501518}
review:
도트퀄리티는 최상급 UNI, BB보다도 뛰어나다
필살기 컷인도 퀄리티가 엄청 높다
하지만 해상도 고정, 옵션설정 부실, 컨트롤러(xbox one, 권바 조이스틱)미지원
히트박스가 애매하고 누워있을때 타격이 불가능, 캐릭터에 비해 맵이 너무 좁아서 불편하다
모드도 아케이드, 버서스 둘뿐이고 취소버튼도 없어서 껏다켜야한다

그래픽은 2D격겜에서 최상급이지만 격투게임이라기엔 너무 답답하고 힘들다

author: {'steamid': '76561198029856413', 'num_games_owned': 511, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1628564232}
review:
Don't buy. If you really... [b]REALLY[/b] want to play this game, just search for the Japanese Freeware version and grab LilithPort. It is a good game, but eigoManga (the publishers) really do not care about [b]fixing[/b] the issues brought up by players - for some people, full screen is broken and for the rest, the Vanguard Online client won't even launch, even after doing what eigoManga recommends (Said Recommendation is to update VC++ Redistribs, which does tend to work.) I have already reached out to them about the online fix and ran their recommendation. I've replied back and will continue to work with them on how to get online up and working for those who get an error related to memory protection kicking in. My recommendation will remain the same - don't buy. Just get the freeware game and the LilithPort community caster. Edit: There is a community discord. Discord invite code is FRTxzJJ. They'll help hook you up!

Edit: It's almost been a year since I've posted this and I've checked to see if I still can't play the game. We're still at that point folks. My recommendation still stands - Freeware Version and Lilithport

author: {'steamid': '76561198044270955', 'num_games_owned': 442, 'num_reviews': 450, 'playtime_forever': 433, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1671581066}
review:
Fuck this game.
In fact, this game reminded me of the issue that most fighting games have.
Final bosses that don't make any fucking sense.
This is bad, like unusually bad, like MvC series final boss bad.
You can be good at everything else, but jesus you better know how parry to fight this final boss. 
It allowed me the chance to realize how clunky the controls are, and how they genuinely don't make any god damn sense.
Y'know what's great? 
When you accidentally choose a character, and have no feasible way of going back to the character select screen. So you have to either kill yourself, or close the game, and re-open it.
Great controls.
I could stab the person who didn't play test that.
Or, how about how, if you accidentally pause the game, to check the controls, (which by the way isn't the start button on a controller, its the fucking R3 right stick button to pause) at the end of a match while its loading, the game just stays black and doesn't fucking load.
ALSO RESOLUTION IS JUST STUCK AT LIKE ARCADE STYLE RESOLUTION.
AND DON'T GET ME STARTED ABOUT NOT BEING ABLE TO MUTE THE FUCKING AWFUL SOUNDTRACK, HOLY SHIT.
Yknow what's good? Savant. 
NOT THIS.
Jesus I'd stab my left nut just to shut this game up.
I'm going back in spite once I have the DLC, just to fucking complain more. 
Because god damn nobody deserves my ridicule,
but Allah (praise be upon him) you [i]DESERVE[/i] my ridicule for this shitty port.

On the bright side, I finally understand how to do 1/4 circle moves properly, and I've been faking up until now.
Thank you.
I hate you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198211390004', 'num_games_owned': 1259, 'num_reviews': 188, 'playtime_forever': 132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1595111993}
review:
Eines der schlechtesten Beat 'em ups die ich je gespielt habe. Die Steuerung ist hakelig und ungenau. Die geringe Auflösung kann nicht über die Optionen geändert werden, hier muß man umständlich die Config Datei selbst ändern. Das Optionsmenü ist nur über den Windowed Modus erreichbar, da es sich in der Menüleiste des Fensters befindet. Vom Vollbildmodus wiederum kann man nur per F4 Taste in den Windowed Mode umschalten.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2103956082
Grafisch ist das Spiel trotz der geringen Auflösung recht hübsch, jedoch ist das Gameplay ein komplettes Chaos. Wer solche Spiele mag sollte sich lieber "Garou" anschauen, welches um Welten besser ist.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009465087', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 363, 'playtime_forever': 136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 136, 'last_played': 1594783170}
review:
Ein Beat Em UP - Fightgame mit 10 verschiedenen Anime-Girls. Es ist allerdings nur zu empfehlen wenn man mit Controller spielt. Mit dem Keyboard ist das eher eine Qual als Spass und man ruiniert sich sehr schnell die Tastatur. Von der Spielmechanik errinert das ganze an den Klassiker Street Fighter und die sexy Charaktere sind recht gut gelungen allerdings hielt sich der Spielspass bei mir in Grenzen. Schlecht ist es aber nicht, es ist mehr der Tatsache geschuldet das ich solchen Fightergames nicht sonderlich viel abgewinnen kann. Das hier ist aber auf jeden Fall eins der besseren Sorte. Per DLC kann man noch weitere Girls hinzufügen wenn es denn erwünscht ist.

Es gibt Sammelkarten

Für mehr deutschsprachige Reviews besucht meine Kuratoren-Seite:
https://store.steampowered.com/curator/36693526/

author: {'steamid': '76561198862726419', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 260, 'last_played': 1594251302}
review: Personally, this game is pretty fun and unique. The thing I enjoy most about Vanguard Princess is the jank, which in my opinion is what makes fighting games special and fun. For example, I could cheese a match by landing 2C and then timing the same move for the win. I think the game could be better if the controller compatibility could support more controls like the dpad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198188664927', 'num_games_owned': 1605, 'num_reviews': 386, 'playtime_forever': 316, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 316, 'last_played': 1593810769}
review:
https://youtu.be/wg_FU2ZJuRQ
[quote]Follow my Curator page, [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/41363546-Fruit-N-Doggie-Reviews/]Fruit N Doggie Reviews,[/url] so you can be updated whenever I post a new review.[/quote]
[h1]Overall Rating - Seriously Flawed ★★☆☆☆[/h1]

[h1]First Impressions[/h1]
Vanguard Princess (VP) is one of the earlier games I got on Steam, and is one I didn't play for very long. Back in the day, I didn't have a great set-up for playing fighting games, and still don't if I'm being picky. Either way, I thought it was long overdue that I see how if this title holds up. Was it a good purchase of the more naive me, or did I get pulled in by flashy eye candy?


[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
VP is a fighting game with two main gimmicks to it. The first is that it's made up entirely of females, and secondly after selecting your main fighter, you'll choose a support character to aid you in the fight. You won't switch out and fight as the support members, but they'll aid you with additional attacks or cause status effects on your opponent. It shouldn't change the tide of the fight, but it can interrupt an opponent's combo, or set you up if timed well. Were it not for these gimmicks, VP would play like most other fighters. One oddity is how you can't set any options when you pick VS mode, you just pick which characters both players will use, and immediately start a three-round match.

Within the single player choices, you can play Streak, Team, and Story Mode. Streak Mode is a survival mode to see how many opponents you can beat with one life-bar, regaining a modest amount of health for every enemy you beat. Team Mode pits you against two AI opponents, and is really unfair for a few reasons. A key one is that they can get on both sides of you, surrounding you with constant attacks. Additionally, the game isn't rebalanced so you have a handicap of some kind, such as taking less damage. It's more frustrating than fun, with no reward for clearing it, so I don't see the point. Finally, there's Story Mode. It begins with a small summary of who your character is, and as you progress through the combatants, you'll observe occasional cutscenes to show how the cast relates to one another.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2150106190
[h1]Controls[/h1]
For the most part, the controls function as they would in other fighters, as the face buttons correlate to different attacks, which you'll use to build combos and pull off special moves. However, the 'Y' button is used specifically to summon your support, and depending on which direction you're holding, will determine what move is used. All of the super and special moves in the game should strike a familiar chord for those who've played other fighters, between quarter circle to full 360 rolls across the 'D-pad' or 'L joystick.' At times, I had difficulty executing these moves, but I think that's more to do with my controller and preferences than the game.


[h1]Story[/h1]
VP's story makes me think it could be an anime, which could be what inspired the plot. At some point, a random woman was bestowed with reality-bending abilities. As expected, a global government organization intercepted her, performed cruel experiments, and made her abilities even more potent. This caused strange ripple effects around the world, and young ladies obtained powers too. For a time, this super-charged woman disappears, but has come back to destroy all of mankind. In the end, each of the women who received powers will face off against the woman who granted them powers, as they like the idea of Earth sticking around. You have to remember, they hadn't experienced some of the crap we have.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2150106629
[h1]Visuals[/h1]
This section above all others is how VP hopes to gather your initial interest, with the inclusion of pretty anime girls. Perhaps this would explain why they don't look that original, as they all have generic designs. For example, Yui has long pigtails and a tomboy vibe to her, which probably describes a dozen anime characters. Frankly, I find it easy to get the characters mixed up with each other. Admittedly, the game looks good enough, with smooth visuals, but I find the fan service and sexiness more a detraction than a positive. I suppose I'll let you be the judge of that though. To some people, eye candy might be the saving grace.


[h1]Sound Design[/h1]
The songs for the game aren't tied to the characters, but instead are based around the different stages you'll fight in. I think the music is one of the better features, as they're enjoyable tunes to listen to. There are a variety of attacks in the game, and the accompanying sound effects for them sounded fitting, such as Luna firing her guns. I'll admit, it seems strange to say that the sound effects of hitting women is satisfying or appropriate, but that's the point of the game, so that makes it okay.


[h1]Pros[/h1]
🌟 It might be a bit small, but a roster of 11 characters seems reasonable for a fighting game.
🌟 You have infinite retries to beat the single-player modes.
🌟 Girl power?


[h1]Cons[/h1]
❌ VP lacks features I'd consider baseline. For instance, there's no options menu to change the difficulty of the AI, or set how many rounds are needed to win a match. There also isn't a training or practice mode available to learn different combos and see how much damage different moves cause.
❌ Although you can technically pull off combos, the game isn't well designed around stringing together attacks. At best, you'll do simple ones, such as crouching kicks into a special move. I'm not looking for 20+ hit combos, but a fun fighter should flow into combos naturally.
❌ Whenever you play Story Mode, you have to go through a training section where you fight a motionless bot for five rounds. This isn't a substitute for a practice mode.


[h1]Tips[/h1]
🔍 VP is generic enough that there's not much to recommend specifically for it. The main thing that comes to mind is the support system. Learning what all four of the characters do, and how to trigger their specific moves is useful, albeit not mandatory to succeed.
🔍 Initially, when I started the game, it wasn't responding to my controller. Switching into full-screen mode by hitting F4 resolved the issue though.
🔍 Sadly, I find that spamming a cheap move repeatedly is the best strategy in this game, as the AI is quite simplistic.


[h1] Final Thoughts [/h1] 
At one point, I think the reviews for VP used to be better, but as of mid 2020, it's dropped down to the Mixed level. It's certainly well-deserved, as I think this is a pretty poor release. Even with the DLC, it still lacks content I would expect from even the most basic fighting game. As it relies on eye-candy to try and garner attention and sales, instead of quality fighting mechanics, it's not a game I can recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198335174618', 'num_games_owned': 735, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 270, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1593485017}
review:
VERY barebones game. Upon entering you choose 1-player (story , team, or streak/survival) or versus, where you can only vs another player. The settings let you pick versus mode's stage, timer, and rounds but that's it.
There is NO tutorial or training mode and overall no guide to tell you what certain terms mean such as "cursed xxx" or what each support does. The best you get from this is a movelist in the "pause" menu, if you can call it that. You cannot so much as choose enemy difficulty, something i thought would be included in any game aside from visual novels.
When playing, it got a bit confusing with 4 characters fighting, and i lost track of myself every so often. Over time, you get accustomed to this, but it's very unwelcoming to new players. The fighting didn't feel very fluid or as easy to pick up as many other fighting games like the Power Rangers and Guilty Gear games do. It also felt extremely odd that launching it asks you to choose between online and offline. Why wasn't it integrated into one menu? The characters didn't seem to have much personality in terms of their outfits, nothing to truly make them memorable or have them stick with the player and make you go "yeah i wanna main that one".
Overall it feels like a very generic anime fighter, the kind you would see in the background of a movie or show that didn't wanna pay for the rights to show an ACTUAL anime fighter in, so they just had their friend make something. Or like one of those flash games used to promote a TV show, like that Teen Titans Battle Blitz fighting game, except at least there, i liked the characters and felt a reason to play it. The only reason i want to keep playing this is to unlock the trading cards TBH. Sorry for slamming it so hard, but i wanna be clear why i don't like it and how i felt playing it. 
I cannot recommend this to anyone except maybe someone who is PASSIONATE about fighting games and really likes learning new ones, but even then i would say that there are plenty of really good fighters out there, new and old, that do better than this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054039937', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152, 'last_played': 1617552580}
review:
수작으로 시작해서 수작으로 끝남 미소녀(?)2D 격투게임은 2번째작인데 쫄다구 시스템이 꽤 맘에들었음  대신 식별이 안될정도로 채도가 너무 높아서 배경도 그렇고 캐릭터도 그렇고 장시간하기엔 눈이 조금 아프다  그래서 그런지 필살기마다 서비스신을 넣은듯하다 
나름 OST도 좋고 특히나 그림체가 맘에 든다 일반적인 눈깔괴물 미소녀 스타일보단 약간
 90~20년초 미소녀 스타일이랄까나 전투적으로 다들 성깔있게 생겨서 맘에든다

개인적으로 7천원정도의 DLC 세일 꾸러미도 사봤는데 괜찮은거 같다
 OST 포함 안되어있었으면 안샀을듯

아 그리고 실행했을때 바로 강제종료 당하면 마이크로소프트 입력기에 일본을 추가해라

author: {'steamid': '76561198317881471', 'num_games_owned': 201, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 309, 'last_played': 1590247274}
review:
[h1] 《Vanguard Princess》
《先陣の姬君》[/h1]

[h1]前言：[/h1]
这是我在合卡过程中因为掉落了一张优惠券才得知并购买的游戏，总体感觉颇多。


[h1] 正文： [/h1]


[h1] 游戏介绍：[/h1]
《先锋公主》是一款经典的2D，以美少女格斗为题材的动作格斗游戏所有女角色都有自己独特的格斗风格。游戏可用角色有十名美少女(操作角色)+ 五只可爱LOLI(支援角色)，玩家需要从十个具有独特战斗技能的女孩中选择，并把她们与一个强大的伙伴配对，组成一个不可阻挡的团队。


[h1] 游戏背景： [/h1]

[b] 百科[/b]
近未来，世界被战火包围而愈发疲弊，战争被一再激化。在这之间，发生了旅客机被误击坠事件。生还者是一位名为希尔达·莉泽的少女。少女被无伤救出后，不可思议的力量伴随着成长而开花。民间研究机构开始着手调查，政府军的目的是为了将研究对象进行军事利用。少女那被称为「机动魔术」的力量可以将宇宙之理一并扭曲。将希尔达投入实战后，政府军获得了极大的战果，军方也为了引出更加强大的力量而进行残酷的人体实验。而这次事件导致少女的魔力暴走，引起了「星体冲撞」。古代神剑转生引起了众多少女的「机动魔术」之力携带着魔力形成了冲击波的现象。希尔达在「星体撞击」之后立刻下落不明。得到魔力的少女，则一直站在最前线。少女们美丽的战斗之姿，使得其得到了「先锋公主」的称呼。一年后，本已消失的少女再次现身。作为「理之执行者」转生的少女，开始了使用连宇宙之理都能扭曲的「机动魔术」来消灭人类存在的行动。而「先锋公主」们，如同被「理之执行者」希尔达·莉泽引导一般，来到了这片等待战斗的土地上……

[b] 官方 [/b]
政府对一名年轻女孩的实验引发了宇宙冲击波，赋予许多年轻女孩神秘的力量。她再次出现在这个世界上，并发誓要以报复的方式毁灭全人类。一群勇敢的女孩拥抱她们的力量，走向战场去面对她；不仅仅是为了这个世界，而是为了追求自己的个人动机和梦想。

[b] 自己感受 [/b]
所有操作角色都是美少女......所有辅助角色都是萌萝莉......BOSS也是女生......emmmmmm。嘿嘿嘿~
美少女赛高！萝莉赛高！作为大多数玩家对于这样短流程2D格斗游戏对背景的着重度不高，更何况可用角色都是少女和萝莉，鄙人在此就不详细介绍自己感受了（毕竟大家都一样。重申：奶子赛高！萝莉赛高！）

[h1] 人设： [/h1]
官方设定的每位角色都有自己的背景故事，其中比较惨的就是冰樱枫(ひおう かえで)第七位角色（黑社会的暗杀者，失去了记忆，被委托暗杀政府的官员而上了战场，结果是自己的母亲。），每次战斗开始的时候脱下衣服，性情大变头发也随之变银白，和羽澄绘梨(はすみ えり)看着十分开朗用旋棍的可爱少女。（孤儿，被政府发现卓越的身体能力后送往研究所，但是不堪忍受接二连三的人体试验，为寻求自由而脱逃。）而战斗风格，性格，喜欢与不喜欢的东西，官方也有一一说明,如果有注重人物设定的话可以去一一查询。

[h1]画面： [/h1]
这个嘛就不要太认真了，这款游戏初代是在09年发行的，更新到现在，虽说更新了许多东西包括支援角色从4位到6位，但是画面细腻程度变化不算太大......不过我个人觉得这种画面很不错，也许更细腻了反而没有那种感觉。

[h1] 角色配音和BGM： [/h1]
实属上佳，其中[u] 最终BOSS的声优是たかはし智秋（高桥智秋），曾配音过《犬夜叉》《蜡笔小新》等还有现在的手游少女前线枪娘M82A1。[/u]玩家可操作角色十名，但是该作品操作角色声优总共六名......各位如果有兴趣可以听一下有哪些角色声音比较相似~
我最喜欢的BGM在神社鸟居的场景，是真的好听，当然，其他场景的BGM也很棒。

[h1] 游戏系统：[/h1]
攻击：操作角色轻，中，重攻击和支援角色（Loli）攻击,需要消耗支援角色（Loli）的Lv，Lv1和2放出的攻击不同。
移动：按两次触发突进和闪避。
判定：蹲姿后撤躲避上段敌对角色攻击，其中无法蹲姿躲避的是忽那遥、璐娜·姬木和美留町胡桃。
特殊防御：AB瞬间格挡，格挡成功后敌对角色硬直。
受身：被击飞后瞬间恢复硬直，我一般按中攻击键。
拆投：在被敌人抓住下砸的瞬间触发，可以弹开敌人。（我还没怎么成功过）
气绝：把敌人或者敌人把自己打晕（头上有小鸟飞），连续敲打左右键可以加快解除该状态。
破防：血条下面的骨头标志，破防状态下被攻击会持续受伤。
投掷：6C与4C，6C是向前投掷，4C是向后。


[h1] 总结：[/h1]
[b] 优点：[/b]
1、该游戏亮点是充分的人设和萌哒哒的少女萝莉，如果缩小窗口可以体验到华丽的游戏画面。
2、游戏背景和剧情很是严肃正经，但是游戏内容却以少女萝莉之间卖萌（肉）一般的格斗中发展。极大的反差萌让这款游戏更加吸引玩家。
3、BGM和配音很棒。
4、卡牌和背景好看。

[h1] 缺点： [/h1]
[b] 1、打击感较差。
2、分辨率低的一批。（但是不得不说缩小窗口确实可以体验到华丽的游戏画面。）
3、连招打出来很难。我用忽那唯(くつな ゆい)击飞敌人很少可以连下去的。
4、游戏内容少，只能故事模式和VS模式。故事模式流程很短。
5、系统问题。（没有返回选项？）
6、闪退问题。（个人没有遇到，但是许多玩家遇到了，提出来一下。）
7、优化问题。
8、按键设定问题。（设定按键搞了几遍才成功。）
9、一些玩家无法进入。
10、一直放任前九个问题不管也是一个问题！！！ [/b]


[h1] 个人杂谈： [/h1]
1、这是一款老游戏，放在当时也许可以接受，但是放在现在的话就不一样了。个人认为虽然这款游戏不贵，但是还是要考虑一下再购买、
2、我比较常用的操作角色是忽那唯(くつな ゆい)拿着神剑的那个御姐，和莉莉丝(リリス)全程抱摔用头顶对方的小萝莉。支援角色喜欢用幼化的最终BOSS(最后一个支援角色)。Lv等级2的时候全屏攻击的技能真的顶。
3、不建议购买！


[b] PS：不建议用键盘食用。 [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198306446305', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 650, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 226, 'last_played': 1691355816}
review:
I have only just gotten into this game but it is already one of my favourite beatem-ups. its fast with a deep combat system and awesome art. however it needs a bit of tweaking to get it looking awesome.  i used dgvoodoo2 to set the resolutiion and other video options then reshade with these specific options 1. adaptive sharpening 2. non local means 3. technicolor 2

these things sort out all the bad things about the graphics including contrast, smoothing and denoising and i think its essential to use these in 2020 as it takes this game to gorgeous levels and with online mode just dropping I cant wait to get my ass whooped countless times

author: {'steamid': '76561198065642041', 'num_games_owned': 282, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1585664458}
review: I used to like this game. Now it's pretty much a broken game. Random crashes, controller is completely unusable. Using XInput controllers will slows the game down but using the DirectInput controllers won't want to be recognize by the game engine itself. Playing the game on Windows 10 is terrible you need to downgrade your OS to play this game flawlessly. Online Deluxe DLC is a joke because there's literally nobody playing this game at this point. Why would you need to pay for game if its a freeware game and having this Online Deluxe DLC if the game needs to be pay first on Steam? The game is pretty fun but do not play from this platform, get it for free instead.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053049402', 'num_games_owned': 1623, 'num_reviews': 346, 'playtime_forever': 606, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 606, 'last_played': 1585299937}
review:
За такую цену продавать такой файтинг просто круто, тем более когда выпадает скидка, то игра вообще стоит дешево, еще и карточками можно компенсировать потраченные средства.
Неплохая анимация с графикой и разнообразие персонажей не дают заскучать. Я конечно знаю, что в файтингах задействовано много клавиш, но они расставлены нормально, а здесь можно обалдеть от дичайшего управления, кнопки разбросаны в хаотичном порядке. Создается такое ощущение, что японцы не с этой планеты, раз им удобно так играть) Пока разберетесь в управлении, успеете разве что 1 атакой спамить противника или просто проигрывать. В общем было забавно столкнуться с такой проблемой. Вроде бы нажимаешь кнопку для удара, а у тебя закрывается игра :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198120590732', 'num_games_owned': 1178, 'num_reviews': 137, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1581122206}
review:
[h]Buyer Beware[/h]

This game [b]does not[/b] support steam's community controller configs.  
It won't recognize any settings you set for the game within steam controller configs besides desktop controller configs. The game does however support Xbox controllers natively. 
So, you'll either need to use an xbox controller and/or need to work around using third-party applications or hardware adapters or enable/configure your steam desktop controller config to match the default keys config within the game. 

Overall, its a simple fighting game you'll enjoy for a couple hours with friends. My only problem is that this game should at least recognize steam's controller config api. I tried for 30 minutes to get it to work. Wouldn't recommend until this is patched in.

author: {'steamid': '76561198329741407', 'num_games_owned': 178, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1583501661}
review:
刚下完游戏，想着试玩一下感觉如何。打开游戏就懵了，方向键怎么动不了，esc查看菜单想调键位，发现这好像是手柄，那键盘的呢。然后就关闭，想着重新进游戏在主菜单改吧，然后我就发现问题比原来更多了，比方说游戏窗口时不时变大，时不时变小。键位竟然改不了。总而言之，有点劝退人。我只是想玩下二次元格斗游戏而已咂，不得不说和骷髅女孩相比还是差了些。
不过有一说一，bgm还不错，就当我买了一个专辑吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561198202275977', 'num_games_owned': 32, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1579494784}
review:
After spending a good 30 minutes to an hour just trying to play this game with my PlayStation 4 controller. I couldn't even play the game.

This game advertises having partial controller support, but none of controller inputs on my PS4 controller from the D-Pad, Joysticks, and the four buttons do not respond at all. Tried looking for program alternatives to get around this issue, but none either worked or I nearly caught a virus for it. For those good with keyboard controls (unlike myself) may find enjoyment here, and good for you, honestly. But controller users should not play this game, an' this game should not advertise partial controller support when this doesn't have any at all.

If there's any news or updates concerning this issue coming that I'm not currently aware of, or any solutions to this issue, I'd like to know. Otherwise I'll be looking to get a refund for this honestly good looking 2D fighter.

author: {'steamid': '76561198136407821', 'num_games_owned': 55, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1577918826}
review:
原本是因為情懷才買的……
其實已經有看到評論區的差評，主要是在說UI跟不上時代。想說應該也還好，就買了……

1.不能按B鍵之類的退出，好像任何鍵都是確認
2.沒有練習模式和連段挑戰，只能在VS MODE裡面開練習……
3.沒有設定選項

結論：非常漂亮的畫面和人設，卻被跟不上時代的系統給糟蹋掉。已經完成了這麼久卻沒有什麼改善，有點無法讓人接受。
單純只為情懷的話還是可以買，如果受不了糟糕的系統的話最好別碰。

author: {'steamid': '76561198100232524', 'num_games_owned': 1039, 'num_reviews': 443, 'playtime_forever': 431, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 221, 'last_played': 1686079195}
review:
E' un picchia duro molto street fighter orientend, infatti credo che ci sia lo zampino di qualcuno della capcom dietro. 
A me piace moltissimo grafica e gioco in generale, un plauso alle musiche incalzanti e perfette per le situazioni che le mappe propinano. Peccato che il gioco sia troppo spartano e palesemente incompleto. niente menù. niente impostazioni, praticamente un plug and play dei vecchi cabinati fine anni 90's. E per giocarci è necessario un programma esterno per mettere il gioco a schermo intero, o per impostare l'uso dei controller come antimicro per dirne uno. Giocarci con la tastiera è praticamente impossibile e nemmeno lo steam controller sembra funzionare.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040953622', 'num_games_owned': 191, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 33, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1629327701}
review:
This is a good game. I think it's a little broken because not all controller schemes work for this game. The game has a strict learning curve where the combo system is a pain in the ass to work with. I don't mind the characters but the game is not made for everyone. I do suggest using a fight stick or an older model controller that isn't a Xbox controller because there is a drift issue with the way it reads controller inputs. This is a big issue for those that use Xbox One controllers because if you play the game the controller has a tendency to drift down+left even on a brand new controller. Don't worry it's not the controller because it's just a bad input read from the game.

I am using an old Logitech Dual Action Controller that I bought in 2012. The game does have tight controls and responds well with this controller. 

The art is amazing and very good. I really recommend if you like Anime style fighters such as Guilty Gear or King of Fighters. Really wish there was more feedback from Tomoaki Sugeno in terms of updates and patches to the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198282301091', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1585687033}
review:
You're gonna have to rebind the ever-loving s h i t outta these controls, the characters are all some form of either "sexy anime girl with random crayola melted hair dye" and "the same except they're barely legal and wearing less clothes"
It's okay, there are better fighting games on Steam, this one has a decent enough premise that I'd be interested in seeing it executed better--with characters that actually like have distinguishable differences aside from what colour it is and how much do they look like a teacher taking the annoying "favourite" pupil out to beat the f u c k out of the hussy that's been eying her ex husband up at the weird couples counselling where you have to cosplay to get a session.

7/10 though, it's cheap as children and honestly I want anime garbage like this to dethrone Street Fighter V.

author: {'steamid': '76561198200371423', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4923, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1660961415}
review: If you like Anime style fighting games then this is a game I strongly recommend. From what I've seen and played so far it is a very promising game with great potential. From what I've read, many people may be having trouble playing this game. If so, please download the directors cut DLC. I say this because the game was pretty glitched and janky before I had downloaded the game and once I downloaded it the game ran very smooth. After finding out that the game will be given another DLC (the online DLC) I became very excited to also find out the game itself will be updated as well, so I recommend playing the game now so you can get used to its controls as well as meet it's wonderful characters, however short of an array there may be. which personally I don't mind.

review: The game may be actually good per se, but in its current state it's a complete mess on Windows 10: fullscreen is broken, and controller support - once you get it to work - still seems kinda buggy. It honestly feels like VP is your typical very old game that tries to find a way to function on a modern OS, but ultimately fails, ending up to be more frustrating than enjoyable. Hopefully we'll get a proper updated version, until then... Win10 users beware.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068761699', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 398, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1564377438}
review:
I wish there were Steam Achievements. But the fact that this game is made by one guy, is really impressive for the amount of fighting mechanics involved. It may not seem like it at first, because of how fast paced it is. But it's essentially a whole different type of fighting game. I'd compare it to Street Fighter if it was super fast with odd but cool blocking and assist characters. Totally worth it, especially if it's on sale.

The Ecchi aspect is whatever. If you're into lewd anime girls then A+ even more for your take on this game. If not, then just don't download the uncensored director's cut and it's tolerable.

Also, the Shrine soundtrack is my favourite. I think it's the best in my game but that's my opinion.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062165805', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1558247219}
review:
This is a very bare bones fighting game, that offers essentially two modes: a short Arcade Mode and a local Versus Mode. (Soon there will be an Online Versus DLC released to allow for matches against other players online.) 

Arcade mode varies in difficulty, from AI that are total pushovers to a final boss, that even on lower difficulties can be rather challenging, often for the wrong reasons, like move spam. 

Versus Mode currently only allows for local matches, but this soon will be remedied at the end of the month with DLC that to allow for online matches with other players. The real unfortunate thing is that it allows for Player versus Player matches, but not Player VS Computer matches, so the only real way to try out characters is Practice Mode.

Practice Mode is accessed by starting up Arcade Mode on Easy or by pressing Right Bumper/E key on the main menu. This starts a short tutorial where the game explains the basic controls through speech bubbles and starts a first-to-five match against an AI that just stands in place. There is no way to change the Practice AI's behavior or any option to see your button inputs on-screen.

Speaking of options, here's a few small gripes:

-Changing keybindings, match settings, and stage select is done in an external menu rather than being done in-game.
-If you pause the game at the wrong time the move list menu is covered up (probably because it's on a lower layer than the other assets.) For example, if you pause while someone is doing a special move, [url=https://imgur.com/a/y6Fh5ZS] the character art will cover the move list making it unreadable.[/url] This also happens if you pause the game at match starts, having the Ready Fight animation play over the menus, or at match ends where the screen simply goes black yet remains paused.
-I can't take screenshots in-game, because the Steam overlay doesn't work, so the only way to take screenshots is using my computer's actual screenshot shortcut.
-When playing the game for prolonged periods of time my computer's screensaver is still activated even when I'm mid-match.
-There isn't an option to change the sound levels on effects, voices, and music, and while balanced well with each other, the overall sound is rather loud compared to other games.

The main problem for me, is that the game is so sparse otherwise; it's hard to recommend it for the price. If simply looking for a new fighting game, or just want something to play with a friend, then give it a shot, but if you're playing solo you should try to get it on sale. Alternatively, you could get Skullgirls, it does what this game tries to do, but better in most ways (although it isn't without its own faults.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198010177709', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 171, 'playtime_forever': 347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 280, 'last_played': 1585611802}
review:
This game gets about 2 players as a daily peak.
After years, they announce they will be adding online mode as DLC. Incredibly greedy.

Instead of putting more contents, modernizing the interface or adding a proper controller support, they decided that by stripping a cheat code into a DLC, and adding online mode as DLC were a good idea.

I recommend Arcana Heart, Under Night In-Birth, or Guilty Gear series over this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198351519653', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 200, 'playtime_forever': 364, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 291, 'last_played': 1558075313}
review:
《Vanguard Princess》是一款横版2D美少女格斗类型的游戏，玩家可以从十位美少女之中选择一位进行游戏。每位少女都有着独特的战斗技能，有的以枪械为主要战斗方式，有的则以弓箭或者拳脚来进行战斗。除此以外，玩家还可以选择一位辅助角色帮助自己的战斗，这也算是格斗类游戏的常见套路了。

[h1]画面[/h1]

作为一款14年出品的格斗游戏，本作对于人物的建模上做得还是相当不错的，每位少女的英姿飒爽都完全展现在我的眼前，肥环瘦燕一应俱全，无论你喜欢哪种口味，都能在其中找到你喜欢的类型。每位少女都是一个独特的风景，特别是少女们拳脚相交时不经意间透露出的美好风光，更是让我流连忘返。因为本作是一款2D游戏，所以不会出现一些3D建模做不好，强行要做出3D建模，从而导致建模奇丑无比的情况。

[h1]战斗[/h1]

本作是一款格斗类型的游戏，那么格斗类型的游戏所需的连招肯定必不可少。不要因为它是一款美少女格斗游戏就看轻它，它里面的连招之丰富，技能之华丽，绝对能够惊爆你的眼球。更何况这些技能还是以美少女的形式展现出来，让这些战斗也变成了一场艺术，让我觉得赏心悦目。

[h1]总结[/h1]

本作作为一款老式格斗游戏，有着其独特的动漫风格，再加上美少女这一点，为它加了不少分数，如果你喜欢美少女格斗，那它一定是一款你不容错过的绝佳游戏。

[quote]
我的游戏真的有那么好玩吗?
关注[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/34823631/]鉴赏家[/url],这是你从未体验过的船新版本~
[/quote]

review:
[h1] 캐릭터로 먹고사는 격투게임 [/h1]

출시된지 10년이 된 격투게임인데 지금해도 게임자체 퀼리티는 준수할정도로 당시엔 훌륭한 퀼리티 였다.

그런데 게임성은 조금애매한데,  AI전만 지원하는데 AI수준이 들쭉날쭉이고 케릭간 벨런스는 그다지 신경안쓴것 같다.


게임 가성비는 훌륭하지만 업데이트를 DLC로 하는 기행을 보이고 캐릭터 추가 외의 업데이트 컨텐츠는 상당히 별로인 편 (2대1모드는 누구머리에서 나온걸까)


사실 격투 게임으로 봐서 추천하기엔 조금 애매한점이 있지만...


[b]캐릭터 빨로 하는거잖아 이거?[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198207931297', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1556568869}
review: Realmente me costó adaptarme al juego. Al principio no podía pasar del tercer combate, ahora pues he ganado 2 veces el juego. He leído que a algunos no les funciona el mando, pero en mi caso ha funcionado bien. No es difícil aprenderse las habilidades (son todas la clásica abajo+atrás+ataque y combinaciones por el estilo :V), pero creo que realmente les hace falta poder combinar mejor los ataques. También creo que los jugadores inexpertos van a tener mucha dificultad a la hora de combatir contra personajes de "rango" (que atacan a media-larga distancia) y los que te spamean todo el round. Si no te molesta que el juego esté en inglés y quieres un juego de peleas en 2D, de anime, con posibilidades de cromos y de 2 jugadores, más la compatibilidad con mando, te lo recomiendo (aunque creo que lo mejor sería que lo compraras con descuento).

author: {'steamid': '76561198062247697', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 204, 'playtime_forever': 743, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 742, 'last_played': 1552233817}
review:
How to beat your waifu without jailtime 101.

This is a very entertaining 2 on 2 fighting game. The characters are not repetitive, though those are your normal Fighting Game troupe: slow long-range, fast close-range, grapling, etc. The waifus do play quite different and the Assist (the lolis you chose to fight along with your main character) also play quite differently. 

The music is sadly very repetitive, but the plot is very deep and got me thinking [spoilers]jokes, there is no plot xD[/spoiler]. The panty-shots add an extra layer of complexity to the environment which completely changes your perspective of the events taking place in the game. In the end it is all about friendship, freedom and pantsu.

The game could seriously use some polishing. For instance, you cannot restart to the main menu. Fullscreen mode is kinda sloppy, and Linux port completely borked at some point (but it works fine with Steam Play; thanks Steam Devs, you guys are THE BEST). I don't know what people mean when they complain that their controller didn't work, mine worked without a problem.

Unfortunatelly there are no achievements, but I forced myself to finish the game with every waifus anwyay. It was entertaining except for Lillith, which is both annoying and terrible to play.

This game is just as expensive as a beer, and it is a great to throw time away with your friends over a drink at home. The casual and completely ridiculous tone go well together here. Definitely a thumbs up.

author: {'steamid': '76561198198631886', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 321, 'playtime_forever': 375, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 352, 'last_played': 1592845893}
review: Управление тут примерно такое же как в Dead or Alice серии, только у вас обязательно с собой должна быть Лолли миньён который может и наподдать и защитить. Графика в клёвом рисованном Аниме стиле, такой классной картинке я давно не видел в файтингах. Сюжет тут тоже есть и у каждого персонажа он свой. Персонажи разные и оригинальные, будто разработчики хотели создать что-то уникальное. Очень казуальная игра, но мне норм.

author: {'steamid': '76561198221018520', 'num_games_owned': 1001, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 365, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 365, 'last_played': 1550850744}
review:
Vanguard Princess è un picchiaduro bidimensionale che non delude le aspettative; offre un buon gameplay e un catalogo di soli personaggi femminili che sembrano tirati fuori dalla più scialba delle fanzine erotiche.
Ma il bello sta tutto li, il gioco è coloratissimo e offre tanto fanservice sin dalla scelta dei personaggi fino alle animazioni delle mosse speciali; purtroppo è giocabile solo si finestra e non a schermo intero...
Ma per 5 euro cosa vi aspettavate?
in offerta è un must-have secondo me, ma tutto dipende da quanto siete malati per le "donnine sexy degli anime giapponesi"!

author: {'steamid': '76561198328982086', 'num_games_owned': 159, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 544, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 454, 'last_played': 1635650391}
review:
Um jogo de luta repleto de meninas de corpo com características avantajadas poderia ter algum defeito? Sim, ele tem!
 Graças ao visual extremamente belo deste jogo, a quantidade de informação na tela o torna bastante confuso em batalhas mais frenéticas, onde você vai definitivamente perder a noção de onde sua personagem está (Sim, eu sei que parece irônico.). A jogabilidade é simples e bastante funcional, o jogo é bem desafiante na dificuldade média, os sprites são BELÍSSIMOS e MUITO BEM ANIMADOS (destaque pra Luna Himeki. Você já percebeu que ela luta de salto alto?)
 Mesmo com tantos pontos positivos, eu diria que o ideal é esperar uma promo para ter essa coletânea de melões saltitantes.
           -A VERSÃO AQUI DA STEAM NÃO TEM ONLINE!-

review:
Her şey iyi güzel de, yıl olmuş 2018 yahu...
2009 da Linux ve Windows işletim sistemine çıkmış bir oyunsun sen. Port edilmişsin, yeni sistemlere uyumluluk sağlaman gerekmez mi? 
Neden tam ekran olmuyorsun mesela anlatsana biraz?
Veya kontrol şeman neden bu kadar bozuk?

author: {'steamid': '76561198034966188', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1545821286}
review:
You get what you pay for, but I expected better.

Pros:
Visually appealing: Good sprite animations, Stages and character design.

Cons:
Bad layout for menu navigation
No in-game volume control
No REAL practice mode
Can't fight against AI in Vs. Mode
Fighting has no flow and feels very rigid and contained
Core mechanics for each character seem bias and inbalanced depending how detailed their aesthetic appearance is, leaving some characters movesets feel lazily mashed together.

review:
The reason this game has so many problem is because this game is still using that old out of date crappy fighting game progam called fighter maker. this game would have been so much better and have support for controllers if the programmers had used something that's actuallly modern instead of that fighter maker garbage that came out back in the early 2000's.

I would like to play it more and see if I could give it a positive vote but because this is still a fighter maker game I can't do it since games made for that engine don't support anything made today.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198119281685', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1419889479}
review:
Pra mim o jogo é péssimo, mas vou colocar pros e contra pra deixar isso claro:

- Pros
  Se você gosta de jogos de luta
  Se você gosta de animes fanservice
  Baixo custo
- Contras
  Menu horrivel
  Pra entrar no treinamento você tem que usar um comando de botões
  Interface horrível
  Personagens nada cativantes
  Clichê
  Mau feito
Basicamente, se você quer jogar apenas por ser Fanservice e ter peitos pulando na sua cara o tempo todo, compre esse jogo. Mas na questão de qualidade de jogo, esse jogo é horrivel e não aconselho.
