author: {'steamid': '76561198009394366', 'num_games_owned': 2662, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 162, 'last_played': 1448417269}
review:
[h1]Review in English/Spanish 
Análisis en Inglés y Español:[/h1]

[h1] English: [/h1] 
Vanguard Princess is a 2D fighting game made by a single person and the end results are good. Impeccable sprite work, cute girls, lots of panty shots if that’s your thing but it also has its fair share of issues:

The game runs in a meager 640x480 resolution and it ruins the gorgeous sprites. You can resize the screen but the end results won’t be pretty and not much can be done about it since the original sprites were made with that res in mind. The gameplay while decent felt a bit lackluster. I would like to mention that I’m not a fighter buff so my opinion might not be the most accurate.

If you are still on the edge you can download the original version for free from the creator website.

[h1] Español: [/h1] 
Es un juego anime de lucha realizado totalmente por una sola persona y puedo decir que hizo un trabajo asombroso. Los sprites son hermosos, la música decente y el elenco de personajes carismático más no todo podía ser color rosa... 

Al abrir el juego nos recibirá una triste resolución de 640x480 que no permite apreciar la calidad de los sprites en todo su esplendor, la ventana es expandible pero desafortunadamente no le sientan muy bien. El combate entreteniene durante un par de horas pero no es nada del otro mundo, agregar que no soy muy ducho en el tema ni un entusiasta por lo que mi opinión puede no ser del todo acertada.

En resumen, buena forma de matar algunas horas. Si por alguna razón quieres darle un vistazo sin hacer la inversión tienes la opción de descargar el proyecto original totalmente gratis en la página oficial del creador.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012778917', 'num_games_owned': 2877, 'num_reviews': 165, 'playtime_forever': 303, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 303, 'last_played': 1447865319}
review:
Vanguard Princess is actually a pretty nice fighting game, with some solid combat system, simple but complex at the same time, and that can have some good difficulty in its arcade mode. You'll need to understand how the combat and the character works, so you can push your way to victory.

In this game you have some assist characters that are small and actually cute, the game has nice graphics, so it is cute everywhere. These assist characters actually are kinda hard to get the intuition of them, so you'll also need to understand them.

This game has some ecchi appeal, so if you get easily offended by that, it is not for you. Also, this game lacks some options ingame, being too simple, as in, you probably will only use the arcade menu, and also it lacks a online multiplayer that could improve the replayability of the game, since it also does not have any history at all.

But, this game is pretty cheap, and you can buy it at an even less cost in a sale, and also you can have fun with it, so you can buy it and have some fun. Also, if you have some local friend, it is also a nice plus to the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048922956', 'num_games_owned': 603, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1476114445}
review:
Vanguard Princess...
Compared to most Japanese Doujin Fighters (Majority of them will NOT be found on Steam FYI), it's reminiscent of older Capcom Fighters.

The game is deliberately slower paced and not nearly as complex as other games, and as such requires more reading your opponents than being able to understand mechanics. 

The artwork is absolutely gorgeous and the animations are incredibly fluid at their native framerate. Chances are this is due to the amount of fanservice in this game (always a positive).

Also also also there's one DLC you [b]must[/b] get...
The Director's Cut. 
IT'S FREE
IT'S FREE

author: {'steamid': '76561198049959644', 'num_games_owned': 1008, 'num_reviews': 142, 'playtime_forever': 359, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 359, 'last_played': 1448336546}
review:
Thanks Humble Bundle for this game.. It's.. Ok I guess.

Pros:
-Fast Gameplay
-Controller Support
-Great Anime Art
-Easy to pick up
-Easy moves
-Cool helper/assist person
-Hot chicks beating the snot out of each other

Cons:(Here we go..)
-Really awkward difficulty scaling
-Full screen makes the game blocky/pixelated
-No way to change resolution or tinker with graphic settings
-No way to tinker with audio settings
-Reptitive JPop(Unless you like that sort of thing, its decent at best)
-Zero tutorial
-No way to practice
-2 Game modes for single player or local co-op only
-Not too many characters.

6/10 overall. I suggest buying this on humble bundle before it's gone. It's only a dollar. and you get several other games, all of which have trading cards if you're into that.

Tbh, really makes me want to buy Skull Girls.. xD

author: {'steamid': '76561198044354030', 'num_games_owned': 311, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1453864314}
review:
Girlfriend got me a humble bundle and this came in it.
I mean it's a decent FIGHTING game, lack of practice mode really killed it for me though, even then the 2 player mode can be set to practice, but it's still timed and shit so there's really no point in trying to memorize about 9 different combos in 60 seconds.
It plays really well with an xbox controller, just gotta learn how every character works, each one has a very unique fighting style and their own combo list and it feels like there was a lot of effort put into the originality of their characters working.
I don't really like the character design especially the stupid little loli assists you get, way too lewd man holy shit. 
I'd much rather be playing Mortal Kombat and Skullgirls but this is a nice alternative that I can run on my laptop.

author: {'steamid': '76561198260119205', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1507594298}
review: 对于这款游戏，其内容或许不是很丰富，然而里面对人物的塑造，以及打击感做的都非常到位。在操作上与一般的的街机游戏一样，相对于键盘，手柄操作应该是最佳选择。而这款游戏还能吸引到人的地方是其配音很好听，人物很萌，对于日呆来说，这真的是一款相当不错的游戏。在平时和好朋友玩耍的时候，这是一款不错的选择。然而，说了这么多，我还是想说，手残党还是放弃吧。。。技能按不出来是硬伤呀！！！！

review: Team Mechanics are bad. The plot is bad, because how can a girl who controls the freakin' universe's laws be captured by the government. But the music was generically anime didn't make me feel like I was going into anything madoka magica shit. Hilda was like screen blaster 9000 taking so much and was stuff. While in the middle of single player mode you couldn't pause the game and look up their combos ingame, nah you had to google search that stuff. All in all. Real ugly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198104696401', 'num_games_owned': 574, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1501129254}
review:
La mayor parte de las horas de juego que  con este titulo fueron Offline antes que nada estimo alrededor de 15hrs jugando con casi todas las personajes , solo evite a Lilith pues como  personaje en lo personal me ha desagradado y fastidiado. Un pequeño exponente indie de los juegos de pelea que se a posicionado bien destacandose que fue el trabajo de Tomoaki Sugeno ex programador de capcom que se encargo casi completamente de desarollarlo con sus recursos incluyendo sorpesivamente la bellisima direccion artistica y el excelente  diseño de personajes por lo tanto aun sin ser un producto completo o perfecto  (Se menciona que  ofrecio como freeware en su primera ediciòn). 
-!!UN MARAVILLOSO , PERFECTO Y HERMOSO DISEÑO DE PERSONAJES(Saki Mintonoya,Haruka Kutuna y Luna son especialmente bellas) !!!!!
-Perfecta Direccion artistica(Algunas secuencias narrativas se ilustran con muy biuen hechasilustraciones.)
-Buen Fanservice al apor mayor como tiene que ser en un juego de peleas donde todos sus personajes con chicas.
-Buena animacion de personajes (Pues son chicas  en un juego Japones de estetica anime/manga es ovbio que la animacion tiene fanservice en muchso movimeibto y y las tecnicas de combatee destacando la animacion de la patalla de victoria de cada personaje muy bien hechas)
-Si bien la historia no profundisa es buena y acpetable considerando la naturaleza del juego.
-Algunos escenarios estan muy bien diseñados.
-El ando de Xbox 360 se  sincroniza bien con este titulo.
Contras.
-PRIMERO ESTA DESBALANCEADO siendo las personajes màs desbalanceadas a mi parecer la voluptuosa Luna  , la p_rra de Lilith tiene ataques por agarre demasiado  poderosos y  incluso la IA al controlar a esta maldita de dos agarres ya te disminuyo 3/4 partes de tu vitalidad, de las asistentes la version infantil Hilda Rize puede ser demasiado poderosa mas de lo necesario, el esto si podria considerarse balanceadas.
- No hay mucha personalizacion de control y salir del juego en medio de un apartida es un poco molesta , no hay menu para hacerlo hay precionar una convinacion de botones para hacerlo.
-No hay un modo Online para jugar ademas que jugar con tros jugodador en el mismo  es algo complicado.

Puedo decir al final que es de la misma casta que Skull Girls o Arcana Heart pero le falto un poco de trabajo (No ha habido parche de revalance por larte del desarollador), es un titulo bien hecho pero no perfecto ,si te gusta Ecchi y el fanservice en Anime o Manga, lo titulos de pelea es un titulo que en definitiva uno debe de probar al final no esta demas esperar a que este de descuento para adquirirlo que por cierto suele a estar con buen descuento durante las ventas especiales. Agradezo a mi querida novia Ivette por ser este juego un regalo especial que ella me hiso .

author: {'steamid': '76561198064431279', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1431901183}
review:
ATENÇAO O JOGO A SEGUIR É CONTRA INDICADO PARA PESSOAS MCOM DENGUE, EVANGELICOS Q PREGAM MOVIMENTOS CONTRA JOGOS Q TENTAO LEVAR SUA MÃO A MAROMBA E AQUELES LOKOS Q BROTAM DO NADA PRA FALAR Q VC É O MAIOR VIRJAO Q EXISTE E PRECISA PARAR DE TER UM RELACIONAMENTO SAUDAVEL COM UMA BOA P*NHETA DIARIA

esse jogo bacanudo que vc ta vendo é feito praqueles tarados q conseguem batalhar pelo espirito da mas**urbaçao usando  sua capacidade mental no maximo pra fapar com censura embora as roupas sejam curtas e com gemidos q te deixao aloprar durante o jogo ele tbm poe lolis no seu caminho caso vc seja dakeles tarados q a sociedade ja deu como caso perdido

mesmo q tudo isso seja verdade oq eu realmente acredito não deixe q a realidade te ponha pra baixo compre esse incrivel jogo e desfrute dos bons momentos gozando de alegria e nao do fato de ser um cara la pra casa dos 20 ou mais q ainda mora no porão dos pais e se perder a virgindade algum dia sera com uma parede q vc acabou de fazer um buraco
ignore tudo isso e seja feliz nesse joguim bacanudo

author: {'steamid': '76561197999027324', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1446155827}
review:
Pas de jeu en ligne, pas de succès, lent, rigide, nombre de coups très limité, impossibilité de jouer en plein écran... Il n'y a quasiment rien dans le jeu à part les combats, et là encore, c'est limite. Seul point positif, les graphismes plutôt jolis, du moins si vous aimez les filles manga à gros seins.
Si vous voulez payer pour une trad anglaise truffée de fautes qui vous permet de comprendre une histoire sans intérêt alors achetez-le. Sinon vous pouvez le télécharger gratuitement en japonais, ce qui me paraît fort plus raisonnable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119753073', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 302, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1573849045}
review:
I got this game on sale at around three dollars and I have to say it was worth the price. Ignore the bad reviews. Despite being only a few dollars, its one of the more addicting fighting games I have played. In addition to that, don't forget the boobs, ass and panties to add. Regarding the joypad issues people are having, I had no problems getting this game to work with a joypad; I use the PS3 controller with MotionJoy and it works flawlessly. I would assume the 360 controller would work just fine.

Final Score: 7.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198107528992', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 184, 'last_played': 1703373979}
review:
日本語版＝公式サイトでダウンロード（無料）
英語版＝Steamでダウンロード（有料）の逆おま国です。

2つのバージョンをプレイしてみましたが、
文字以外の特別な違いはありませんでした。
Steam版ではDLCがあり何かオマケ要素があるようです。

このゲームは元ゲーム会社の方が1人で3年半かけて
2D対戦格闘ゲームツクールで作ったゲームだそうです。

ゲーム自体は単純な2D格闘アクションゲームで、
メインキャラクターとサポートキャラクターを
選択して擬似的に2vs2で戦います。

操作は弱攻撃、中攻撃、強攻撃、サポート攻撃の
4種類のボタンで戦いコマンド技などを駆使して戦います。
超必殺技みたいなのを使うとアニメーションで
カットインが入る演出があったりします。

使うボタンの数も少ないし全体的に難しい
コマンド技もないのでカジュアルな感じに
遊びたい方にはオススメのゲームです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198132204442', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1482536346}
review:
Sinceramente? Acho um jogo decente.
Para iniciantes, este jogo é uma dor imensa! sem opções, sem tutoriais... apenas te botam pra lutar sem preparo algum e dane-se!
O game é até fluente, ponto pra ele. a historia é bem clichê e o sex appeal é a marca predominante para os otakus de plantão babarem pelas suas waifu.
É apenas mais um J-Fighting comum. recomendo apenas para quem é otaku, fã de ecchi e quer aumentar sua coleção de Waifu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164557965', 'num_games_owned': 5145, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1429341342}
review:
6/10，质量中庸的格斗游戏。
在上Steam之前本作在网络上流传已久，当时我也下载下来玩过很长时间，就简单讲一下这部作品的优缺点。
首先，这部作品除了手感奇怪之外倒是没有什么太大的缺点，包括音乐、画面等都算说得过去。比较遗憾的是本作没有联网对战，只能单机的FTG的确没有什么意思。
单机多人模式倒是稍微可以打打，几个角色设计的倒都是像模像样，习惯了手感之后姑且还是可以好好玩一玩的。
另外，原价入不太值，毕竟进包公主……实际价值大约也就10RMB，不能再多。

author: {'steamid': '76561198024095191', 'num_games_owned': 1017, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1445057963}
review:
The resolution is entirely too small for the characters, the game can sometimes crash after a Game Over, and the controller support is completely broken. This is on top of an already fairly shallow fighting game (although the Ally mechanic has great potential).

On the other hand the sprites are pretty good looking and there's lots of panty shots. Form your own opinions about what's more important.

author: {'steamid': '76561198094528414', 'num_games_owned': 536, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 746, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 635, 'last_played': 1704166818}
review:
7/10.  I do love this game, but have to be fair. 

Pro's:
This game has fun characters to use, every character has a completely different fighting style and most special attacks have similar commands making it easy to remember if you are changing characters up.

The music is decent and the levels look nice. But no real story, you can get the directors cut for like 30 second conversations, then thats it.

Con's:
The Hilda DLC is pointless. Basically if you don't enjoy playing fighters, get her. All her basic attacks are specials. Nothing more. She has no real attacks, and not real entertaining to use. I only got her because I like owning everything in fighters.

There is no real practice mode. It says to use 2 player to practice, and no online mode.

You can be having a good game then run into someone like Lilith who will spam 1 attack the entire fight.

Hilda is the final boss, and she is basically a 24/7 spammer. You thought Shao Kahn was bad in mk9? He atleast paused. Hilda is maybe the most poorly made fighter AI I ever seen. Basically she will use nothing but range attacks. You get close and knock her down, she will get up, teleport behind you and send you flying, and go back to the otherside, continuing her spamming..
You can beat her if you can learn how to keep her down. But 1 mistake and she can easily take a quarter of your health out instantly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012363945', 'num_games_owned': 2121, 'num_reviews': 409, 'playtime_forever': 820, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 453, 'last_played': 1710011844}
review:
Everyone has the game - it is constantly sold in bundles. But have you played it? You really should. It has very good depth yet the Easy mode is somewhat possible to beat by training a bit until you learn the moves . Becoming somewhat good to play the game does not require excessive learning.  

Game is not easy in any way but reading wikis such as the excellent mizuumi.net wiki and training in vs mode will get you good enough to enjoy the game. 

If using gamepad you may need to configure a joystick emulator. i use Joy2key to play it with the gamepad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164388962', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1678555729}
review:
To start with, this is a shallow but quite a fun kinda shallow game that is very well worth it's cheap price tag. Keep in mind this is doujin fighting game so i bought this game not expecting much, and well it did "slightly" exceed my expectations.

Visually this game is beautiful, anime styled graphics with *ahem2* characters who well, pretty much sums up anime industry nowadays. Also gotta love the skill cut-ins and the victory animations . Since it looks fluid, well and the fanservice and stuff >////<. Audio and OSTs in this game is ok, but not much , i can't really remember any of the tracks @@

Gameplay is neat, however take into consideration that when they said it is a 2v2 fighting game, it is more of a 1 main 1 assist kinda game, you never really get to control your partner and there are only 5 partners to choose from. I find this game quite easy to pickup since most normals do a lot of damage and some specials do super's level of damage(the supers don't do much damage) The character roster is small but complete since you have your grappler, projectile spammer, rushdown chara etc. (though no charge or trap type characters :c , but i guess this is to help to keep the game simple)

Would i recommend it? Yes and no. Yes if you are a huge fighting game fan and have some basic knowledge on FGC. If you are looking to take a break from competitive games like USFIV or DOA5 or something and just want to have casual fanservice fun with your perverted mates, Go on ahead, this is very worth the price tag. No if you are looking for something deep, if there is anything this game lacks, it is content, no online play, no unlockables, pretty much what you see is what you get. Oh and although this game is easy to pickup, for newcomers to the FGC, skip this, not because it's hard but due to the game not giving any help and guide whatsoever, you are left to search for it yourself which may be a deterrent for newcomers :c

The nicest thing to say about this is it is a well rounded, simple and fun 2d fighter for anime/fighter fans can enjoy. To put it in the worst way possible is that this is a poor perverted man's version of Arcana Heart 3 and Skullgirls.

P/S: Lock the doors before playing this game, you'll thank me later c:

review: I've always liked 2D fighters so I figured I would give this game a try. While its not the greatest game, I can tell a lot of effort and love was put into it. I only wish the controller support was better and that the difficulty was more even, especially on easy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123761712', 'num_games_owned': 237, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 4252, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 618, 'last_played': 1465605476}
review: Vanguard Princess é como um jogo normal de luta 2D, há muitos combos e estratégias diferentes para ganhar. Eu me senti muito desafiado por não conseguir passar de certas batalhas contra a cpu que achei que seriam bem simples e tranquilas mas as meninas (personagens do jogo são todas garotas) dão uma divertida e provocada. Fazendo e decorando combos realmente difíceis vai botar sua skill a prova. Uma coisa que o jogo não tem é multiplayer online, mas da pra jogar o multiplayer offline de duas pessoas controlando pelo WASD e pelas setas. Fora isso, o jogo tem personagens criativos, ambientes legais até e uma trilha sonora decente. Se você gosta desses jogos com personagens nuas aqui talvez não seja seu lugar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198157191654', 'num_games_owned': 203, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 584, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 319, 'last_played': 1576852566}
review:
Well well, what can i say about this game...

First of all : This game is loaded with dem tiddies. HUGE ones.

Second : For some stupid reason, the gameplay is awesome in its own way. It's fast, there's a variety of combos with your support char and it's balanced. BlazBlue level. And you know it's hella balanced when it's on BlazBlue level

Third : If you came for a deep, rich and intriguing story, you're on the wrong place. This game has your basic clichê story, and it's the only point about it that really sucks (Aside from the fact that you have to download a unofficial tool just to be able to play online, which is BS)

My rating : 8,7/10

- Awesome Gameplay - Check
- Awesome Music - Check
- TIDDIES - Check
- Booty all over the place - Check
- Clichê Story - Check
- DEM TIDDIES - Check

If you really took your time and read this stuff, congrats. You've wasted 10 minutes of your life that you could've used to go and buy the damn game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119764226', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1441595916}
review:
[b] [h1]Corra desse jogo![/h1][/b] 
[b]Não se deixe enganar por fotos e vídeos.[/b] 

[h1]Contras[/h1] 
- Poucos Golpes

- Cenários poluídos, tem alguns cenários que estão cheio de personagens no fundo que te deixa perdido ao meio da batalha.

[h1]Prós[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198051356369', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 259, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1672894693}
review:
Otimo game....Mas

Tem uma jogabilidade ruim, sem comandos basicos (Soco ou chute rapido), falta de equilibrio (Sim modo (F)oda-se ativado) e Peitos do tamanho de minha head balançandu (Isso n é ruim :) pelo menos não pra mim)

Nota: 6 
Otimo Grafix2D
Boa soundtrack

author: {'steamid': '76561198079531279', 'num_games_owned': 237, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106, 'last_played': 1477293706}
review:
Not a bad game, by an means, a bit overpriced with all the DLCs.
Great time waster, requires a modicum of skill to get the hang of, no tutorial or real practice mode, and the only way to see the character moves is in the single player character select screen.  
If you're looking for a hi-quality fighting game; this isn't it, but if you're looking for something fun to waste time with every now and again, catch it on sale and its awesome.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062448641', 'num_games_owned': 2313, 'num_reviews': 305, 'playtime_forever': 221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 221, 'last_played': 1441458219}
review:
Поначалу неудобно играть, даже с настроенным управлением - привычная для меня раскладка MK тут не работает, потому как отсутствуют "верхний удар рукой", "нижний удар ногой", блок и прочее, зато реально можно забить противника одним ударом. Рисовка красивая, в движениях нет рваности, девушки орут прикольно, а стонут... блин, если убрать звуки ударов и не смотреть на картинку - стойкий прилив крови в нужном месте гарантирован хD.
На сюжет в файтингах редко обращаю внимание (MK - исключение, естественно), так что ни плюсов в нем, ни минусов искать не стану. Боевка быстрая, в полном соответствии с обычным аниме-стилем. Некоторые моменты напоминают о DB, вот только не пойму, чем же именно. На заднем плане бегают какие-то помощницы, из-за которых на экране разобрать нельзя, где чей персонаж, что сильно мешает иногда понять, кто выиграл в драке)
K.O.

[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/32313063/] Куратор	[/url]

Ставьте лайк, подписывайтесь на кураторскую страничку и ищите новое в играх!)

author: {'steamid': '76561198048036442', 'num_games_owned': 598, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 251, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1534706193}
review:
Vanguard Princess

Интересная игра (файтинг), в котором персонажи игры - милые анимешные девушки и девочки, сражающиеся со злом.

Сюжет игры прост: над родным городом девчонок нависла угроза, и они вынуждены спасти его ради мира во всём мире.

У каждой героини есть своя история. 
Девочки очень красивые. Анимешные всё-таки ^_^
Тут есть японочки... И даже русская девушка Наталья! :З
Есть милые девочки-помощницы (лоли-саппорты).
Они будут оказывать помощь в борьбе с противницей.

Можно играть не только самому, но и вдвоём.
Но только на одном компьютере.
Игра не мультиплеерная.
Что очень огорчает.

Отдельное внимание приковывают костюмы главных героинь и их милых девочек-помощниц.
Красиво, мило, оригинально =)
А также, большое обилие труселей (панцу-шоты, для знатных любителей эччи-аниме) ^_^

Итоговая оценка: 4 из 5
Минус бал за отсутствие мультиплеера.

Итак. Запускайте игру и начинайте битву ради мира во всём мире))

Приятной вам игры :-*

author: {'steamid': '76561198113175272', 'num_games_owned': 1074, 'num_reviews': 200, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1440850440}
review:
发行日期：2014年3月4日

软妹子拯救世界
用拿剑的Yui妹子通了简单和正常难度的剧情，虽然剧情不是太了解，反正就是拯救了世界的样子
这个妹子的几个招不像有几个妹子那样有弓箭和弹药的数量限制，而且效果拔群，比较好连招
有好几盘真是险象环生，一丝血反杀
唯一欠缺的就是如果能给剧情里的对白加上配音就太好了，别告诉我买DLC才能有配音，这么坑不好吧

顺便问一下，这游戏算是日呆吗？

author: {'steamid': '76561198083170049', 'num_games_owned': 223, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 693, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 636, 'last_played': 1469915119}
review:
Se vc ta em duvida se esse jogo roda em um pc mais fraco, saiba q eu consegui fazer ele rodar em um Windows Vista Starter, com os gráficos ótimos e com a jogabilidade perfeita, sem quase nenhum lag aparente !!
Não tem muito o q dizer sobre esse jogo, é só mais um nos milhoes de jogos de luta desse tipo, porém com um estilo mais anime.

Ele tem alguns problemas........estranhos......pra começar, por algum motivo o modo tela cheia fica com a imagem muito ruim....mas isso pode ser coisa do meu pc, então ignore. 
Segundo, ele não roda controle nativamente.....vc tem que baixar algum programa à parte para isso (recomendo joytokey).
Fora esses problemas acho q o resto está bem ok.

BONUS: é desnescessario comprar as dlcs, é só se vc quiser mesmo, a unica q é bem util é a "directors cut" q é gratis !!

7.5/10 (aparentemente esse jogo foi feito para homens sem namoradas...mais acho q mesmo se vc for mulher vc vai gostar =D )

author: {'steamid': '76561198025051723', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1440242272}
review:
Petit jeu de Baston japonais certes, mais le minimaliste à notre époque c'est un peu too much !
Commençons par les atouts du jeu. Le chara design est vraiment sympathique et l'animation des personnages, tous féminins, de bonne qualité...
Voila, c'est à peu près tout !
Il n-y-a que peu de personnage, ce sont toutes des gamines cours vétues et secondée de striker "Lolicon" à mort complétement inutile. Quand en plus leurs coup spéciaux se comptent sur les doigts de la main, que la hitbox est douteuse et que les combos quasi inexistant... moué !
En plus, pour un jeu de baston de maintenant et sur Steam : 0 mode online pour s'essayer contre d'autres ! la loose !
Le mode story ne donne pas plus envie que cela, aucune carotte qui nous donne envie de finir : Ni succès Steam, ni mode gallery, ni... Rien !

C'est un jeu pauvre, vide et vite bouclé (2h en passant sur tous les personnages... en tout bien tout honneur hein !).
Heureusement pris en solde à 1€, il ne vaut pas plus et il y'a des jeux de baston gratuit de meilleure qualité !

author: {'steamid': '76561198025617331', 'num_games_owned': 690, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 600, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 465, 'last_played': 1706740687}
review:
It's alright. That's sort of my bottum line with this game.

The controls are fine. The combat has deapth. I'm not going to say it's a LOT of deapth but there is deapth there.

The artstyle is nice. Resolution is annoying (it's square and small).

This may sound like I'm damming with fine praise and you'd probably be right for assuming so. This is by no means a GREAT game. No online play built into it, no easally accessible practice mode, etc. But for what it's worth it can be pretty fun. If your into japanese moe and panty shots than you'll enjoy this game enough. Otherwise feel free to ignore.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120207242', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99, 'last_played': 1452337479}
review:
NEED ONLINE MODE ! 
ONLINE MODE !
作为日呆当然要买。

整体就是非常肉，肥肠肉。
有种我玩着玩着就会肾亏的感觉。

但是很难玩。
虽然比街霸那种母鸭连段好一点，
但是还是很难连，
因为这游戏居然不是取消连段系统，
而是支援连段系统。
支援系统貌似很牛逼，
但我却完全无法上手。

但是没有网战你特么一定在逗我。
为什么我特么买的都是没有网战的格斗？
上一个BBCT也是，
就steam版没有网战，
还不能手柄 VS 键盘。

虽然都是包里的但是还是好蛋疼。

author: {'steamid': '76561198062241368', 'num_games_owned': 546, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1456958010}
review:
Just finished the story version with a character (Natalia I think) and discovered that while keyboard and mouse isn't suited for this game at all (controls are way too wonky) a controller works great. So, if you like fighting games with cute anime girls and not much of a story (pretty much no story at all) then this is for you. But really I recommend only getting this if you own a controller. 

Otherwise, the art is great, voices are pretty much the same for each and no real voice acting is included. The only time they really speak is after the battles and it's in Japanese not English so I've no idea what they're saying. 

Great for a cheap game, but not a stand-out or unique one admist the many other fighting games out there. Personally, I love the art so much that I just know I'm going to replay this game again and again. It's too cute and happy not to do so.

author: {'steamid': '76561197980796094', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 435, 'playtime_forever': 459, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1533588571}
review:
I was promised a fighting game with anime girls. What I got was a disater. A badly coded, unpleasant, repetetive, useless game. No tutorial or practice mode whatsoever makes it hard to understand, what is going on, or even possible. (I played Skullgirls, in any way better, buy that one). The lack of options, rebinding keys, or even resolution change is inacceptible. This game would have been "ok" in 1994. But not today, or anywhen within the last 15 years. Do not buy!!

Follow me as a curator at http://store.steampowered.com/curator/28337205-Fair-Minded-Witness/?appid=298050

author: {'steamid': '76561198037731352', 'num_games_owned': 777, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1547593686}
review:
""JOGO DE LUTA TRISTE""

Eu recomendaria se os DEVs do jogo descem uma atenção melhor para o mesmo.

Vou primeiro para os pontos positivos:
-Gráficos bonitos
-Comandos respondem bem
-Personagens carismaticos
-Combos maneiros

O jogo é divertido, é o tipico fighting game que não adianta girar o controle, que você não ganha, conseguir um bom hit confirm é mais complexo, o esquema de assistencia é bem legal, vc tem 4 ou 5 moves diferentes(n lembro exatamente quantos são) para seu assistente que podem ajudar de formas diferentes dependendo da situação, tem barra de stun, super, etc, coisas bem basicas, vc tem parry(SF3S) e um golpe especifico que seria seu verdadeiro hit confirm.

Pontos negativos
-Não tem online
-Não tem training
-Resolução baixa de video
-O modo versus é muito fraco e apertando tal botão vira um "training" muito de qualquer jeito
-Configuração de controles muito mal elaborada

O jogo poderia ser bom, se tivesse estes problemas citados corrigidos, coisa que não fazem em updates e não sei o motivo....

author: {'steamid': '76561198100793235', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1579498112}

author: {'steamid': '76561198122678750', 'num_games_owned': 278, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 327, 'last_played': 1602477796}
review:
[b] Muitos anos atrás comprei este jogo em uma Summer Sale... Visualmente interessante mas estragado pela mediocridade de todo o resto. [/b]

Visto que não deve receber mais nenhum update relevante aqui vai um review completo da minha experiência.

A qualidade das animações desse jogo é impressionante levando em conta que foi feito por uma pessoa só (Tomoaki Sugeno). A jogabilidade embora não tenha nada de tão especial não chega a ser ruim e infelizmente os pontos positivos já acabam por aqui.

Falando em jogabilidade, o sistema de assists foi a unica coisa negativa pra min no gameplay, os assists ficam na tela 100% do tempo atrás do personagem escolhido causando uma poluição visual que somado aos golpes e movimentação dos personagens formam uma bagunça indescritível.

[strike]A resolução desse jogo é micro e, segundo outros players, dependendo do seu sistema operacional não da pra por em full screen.[/strike]

A compatibilidade com controle é no mínimo frustrante, dos 3 controles que testei nenhum deles funcionou como deveria, de acordo com outros jogadores, até mesmo o controle de xbox supostamente compatível também não funciona, forçando então qualquer um que queira jogar alguma coisa desse jogo a 3 caminhos possíveis: 1. Ter muita, muita sorte e funcionar a primeira coisa que você conectar, 2. Enfrentar a longa jornada de rage de fazer algum controle funcionar de alguma forma, e 3. Jogar no teclado.

Até a tela de seleção de personagens consegue ser ruim, confusa, esquerda e direita movem o cursor pra seleção de assists e cima e baixo movem o cursor de personagens jogáveis, as duas select screens quase se intercalam formando um L ao contrário, deixando a maioria das pessoas sem saber oque esta escolhendo de verdade no inicio.

Vanguard Princess conta com 2 modos de jogo apenas, Story e VS [strike] já que não há suporte a um modo online.[/strike]

A história é ok pra um jogo desses, cheio de fan service obviamente, poderia ser melhor mas é sem duvidas o menor problema aqui.

O resultado é uma bagunça semi-funcional barata. Nem pense em pagar Full Price em Vanguard Princess.

TL,DR: Um balde de fan service e muitas falhas técnicas. Pegue em Sale ou jamais compre.


[b] Update da Análise - 10/2020 [/b] 

- Agora é possível por em full screen, a qualidade não fica 100% mas dá.

- Testei mais dois controles diferentes dos testados nos anos passados, dessa vez, um controle de PS4 e um Arcade Stick Sanwa/Óptico, nenhum deles foi 100%. O controle de PS4 nem sequer foi reconhecido pelo jogo, de acordo com o que pesquisei só com programas de terceiros pra funcionar. O Arcade Stick, entretanto, funcionou parcialmente com a compatibilidade de controle ativada, funcionaram apenas 5 dos meus 10 botões e somente 4 das 8 direções (no caso, nenhuma diagonal). Sendo assim impossível dar um crouching block ou pular pra frente/trás.

- Agora existe um modo online, se funciona bem eu não sei dizer.

[b]Conclusão: Ainda é uma bagunça semi-funcional, não compre.[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561197997504998', 'num_games_owned': 832, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 56, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1439352702}

author: {'steamid': '76561198085698870', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1439058637}
review:
I tried to give this game a chance, but it's just way to glitchy.

First, movement just stop responding randomly. There will be times where your character just stands there, and all you can do are basic attacks while standing. I managed to make it to about the 6th Round just standing and attacking, but once the projectile enemies came in, that was the end of that session.

Second, no tutorial. You're thrown into battle, and get your butt whooped mercilessly, with you having no clue how to perform certain moves.

Third, I opened Full Screen Mode. The graphics messed up to the upper-right part of the window. I try to go back to Window Mode, but I never can. I can't even access the window's tabs anymore. Now I'm stuck with a broken full screen, and that was it. 

 If you're obsessed with cute girls, this is definitely for you. Otherwise, there are better anime fighting games out there (even if you're an anime fan).

author: {'steamid': '76561198008730776', 'num_games_owned': 418, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1439122508}
review:
I was hoping for this to be a decent fighting game but they can't even get the game to work right, apparently.

My PC normally has no issues with games or emulating (Which is what this game feels like, a cheap emulator running an ancient game) but somehow, this game manages to have all kinds of problems on my PC. 
When trying to run it in windowed mode, the framerate is next to non-existent - which baffles me. How can I play Planetside 2 but not even get the menu of a 2D fighting game to run smoothly? And I'm not talking about some mediocre 15 FPS or anything. I mean that there is no visible refreshing in the game - I hear the music playing but the screen displays about ~0.005 frames per second. The blinking of the indicator would probably take 15 minutes. I thought full screen might solve that problem. I was terribly mistaken. Sure, full screen DID solve the framerate. But the game itself remained the same size and resolution on my screen, with a giant black screen filling out the rest. Furthermore, the graphics were replaced by 50 shades of purple. Entirely unplayable. And as far as I could tell, the fighting lacks any sort of depth and the roster is bleak at best. Pantsu or pantsu? Your choice!

TL;DR:

Not a real fighting game, get King of Fighters instead. Ten bucks more but infinitely better. Also not a game made with neckbeard weeaboos as their specific demographic.

EDIT:

Look through the comments. Most people who recommend this game are either trolls who are doing it for the lulz, or weeaboo creeps. if you're either of those, buy the game and recommend it. If you're sane and prefer not to waste time and money, buy something else. Buy some matches and light your face on fire for example. Much more pleasant.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091297049', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 546, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 519, 'last_played': 1473055926}
review:
I really wish there was a middle ground opinion. I do recomend this game and I don't. If you have an Xbox controller then yes. If you don't, then no. 
Pros and Cons-
Pros-
+Lovely animations, music and stages.
+The gameplay is very unique, since you have a main character and a support
+Cool characters, all with different play styles and attacks.
+Ay! Trading cards! B)
Cons-
-THE FINAL BOSS IS IMPOSSIBLE WITH CERTAIN CHARACTERS SHE MURDERED ME IN 30 SECONDS
-Full screen is horrible and you have to play windowed
-Only Arcade and Local VS mode (No online)
-There's no tutorial (I had to mash the keys to figure out how to play)
-Keyboard mode is super horrible
-No unlockables, so there's really no reason to play or real rewards

I liked it until I got to the final boss. The final boss is just so unfair that it ruined the rest of the fun I was having. I liked this game but I have to say that i do not recomend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081780579', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1438907873}
review:
Un picchiaduro 2D realizzato in maniera davvero egregia. Una piccola produzione che ha poco da invidiare ai "grandi".
Grafica stupenda, personaggi carismatici e un gameplay solido; nonostante una semplicità di fondo. L'unica pecca è dovuta alle poche modalità disponibili, ma è più una mancanza del tool usato che dell'autore; tuttavia si fa perdonare grazie ad un numero abbondante di cutscenes.
Consigliato a chi è cresciuto a pane e picchiaduro.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034246419', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 328, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 328, 'last_played': 1438725297}
review:
It's hard for me to put this game down for all the things that it does right - for the price (especially in the humble bundle) it's a solid title.  The characters are diverse from the Brian (Tekken) feeling mech piston girl to a Zangief-homage catholic school girl grabbler it's a bright distinct colorful cast.  Two of the characters even have an ammo system (Arrows or Bullets) which is a bit complex but seems rewarding if mastered in terms of very fast long range attacks.  The final boss is immediately available to play as (with her own support twins) albeit a bit overpowered in her moveset in terms of cheaping out the AI experience.  The controls are adjustable if you don't like the default so you can take advantage of the versus mode if you want to share a keyboard / controller off one pc.

It's an indie title and the downsides are apparent that it was a bit budget with it's customizablity.  You can't adjust the sound volume, the screen resolution is either tiny or stretched to pixelated mess (with parts of the screen adjusted off screen) as the game was written for a much lower resolution than what is available today.  The story-mode is a bit basic and easy, the versus mode is a poor-man's practice mode if you don't have someone to sit beside you (no online play) and there are no additional modes or settings such as turning the support system (which is unnecessarily cluttered at times).

Even with the downsides if you're considering picking up this title through the Humble bundle or an amazing sale price - it's solid in its fighting mechanics and there was obviously a large amount of care gone into the animations, mechanics and designs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043645903', 'num_games_owned': 874, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1438390569}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198022992211', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1588880584}
review:
This game is a joke.

Full screen doesn't work. There's no option inside the game (you start the game and you have either adventure or versus).

You have to change the setting? It's there:

http://i.imgur.com/91zZZl0.jpg

Yes, it's outside the game, on the window tab.

You want to pause the game? It'll not be the "start" button. You'll have to click the right joystick. LOL.

You want to quit the current fight? Esc? No. Start? No. You'll need to do start + A + B + C + D. LOL (bis).

I've try to change the sidekick while selecting my character, nothing seems to be able to do that.

The game may be good, but I simply couldn't go in it. I felt like playing a game made by a computer student in Visual Basic in 1998.

author: {'steamid': '76561198167692373', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1439869604}
review:
When i saw that game, it didn't got my attention.

But humble bundle came and i get it. Well, so why not?

First things first: i don't like hentai or semi-hentai games. I don't buy that idea. But hey, Vanguard Princess is not about boobs and butts. The gameplay it's pretty solid, the ost is fun and the difficult is interesting.

I really recommend this game. Not about it's only girls with short pants or less. But because it's cheap and fun. With only a few bucks you can get a good fighting game. And that's what we should care about.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987978123', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1489194686}
review:
So... This game seems to have some potential, but... pair two of the most stupid things in a fighting game, being : No tutorial at all (only button press list, non exhaustive, and wrong. Cf this hell girl with the 360 + x + B. That doesn't work, weirdly enough it's with LB... and I don't fucking know why the LB button makes me attack in red instead of the immobile guard either because there isn't any fucking tutorial !)

Anyway so the "button tutorial" show you absolutely nothing of value, neither does the command list.

And then comes the difficulty, so you... try on easy let's say, and you beat the ennemies because you kinda found out maybe how to launch an ultimate, not sure though.. Still you're not sure on how you make your ally attack more than the 1 cost attack that doesn't do shit, but you can't know how because there isn't any fucking tutorial... But you do arrive at the last stage...

And here comes Hilde (I think)... And then, you get zoned until there is no tomorrow. Playing the submission move character (the hell girl from before) I have a special that makes me spit fire (close range) and two dash + submission move (one being a jump dash)... And Hilde spams red beams and falling swords and what not, making it IMPOSSIBLE to get close. Let's not even talk about launching my ultimate that has to be as close as can be of the opponent.

So... When you have no zoning, and no way to move close to the ennemy that spams zoning because the easy mode knows how to play 200 times more than you and abuses the system, what do you do...? Well you die, you find a character that can zone, even take hilde, and then spam through all the modes of difficulty these same attacks.

Anyway, difficulty is broken, no tutorial whatsoever makes it very unfriendly for a novice / intermediate player, and the button prompts aren't even correct.

A shame really.

author: {'steamid': '76561198176682855', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1465798069}
review:
동인대전격투게임이지만 의외로 일러스트에 흡사하게 훌륭한 도트그래픽을 볼 수 있습니다.
개인적으론 블레이블루CT보다 색감이 좋습니다.

다만 다른 메이저급 대전격투게임과 비교하여 확실히 적은 커맨드와 부실한 스토리 모드는 아쉽지만 1인제작 게임으로는 나쁘지만은 않은 정도입니다.

거기에다 하드난이도로 하면 예상밖으로 만만치 않은 보스를 만날 수 있습니다.

지갑사정이 여유가 있으시다면 그냥 구매하셔도 좋지만 할인을 자주하니 할인 때 구매하시는걸 추천드립니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198144379887', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1475703926}
review:
[h1]I sold CS:GO items to see waifus killing each other.[/h1]

I have to say that this isnt the best of the best of fighter games on Steam, but is far from bad. In fact, I really like it. I dont think it would be completely worth full price (unless you included all DLC's and some extra features like binding your own keys or online play) unless you are really a huge fan of anime fighters. I got it for $2.50, not horrible. Anyways, let me toss ya' some pros and cons.

[b]Pros[/b]

[list]
[*]Beautiful anime art style.
[*]Now uncensored with more [u]oppai[/u] and [u]pantyshots[/u]! (There never was much to censor either way...)
[*]Trading cards and badges.
[*]Unique "helper"or "support" character gameplay.
[*]High frame level from start.
[*]Simple gameplay (some might find that as a con, but its a pro in my book!).
[/list]

[b]Cons[/b]

[list]
[*]Only 2 gamemodes, Arcade and local VS.
[*]No online gameplay.
[*]Wont keep your interest for too long, as it can get boring after time.
[*]No tutorials, you kind of have to figure out the controls on your own.
[/list]

To end this review, I will rate this game a 7/10. The style and art is great, the gameplay is simple, and is the perfect thing to play when you want someting casual. If your a game collector, get this. If you like slightly ecchi anime or fighters, you should also get this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198187485235', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1444878327}

author: {'steamid': '76561198093090628', 'num_games_owned': 726, 'num_reviews': 214, 'playtime_forever': 431, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 356, 'last_played': 1440076811}
review:
Дамы и господа, это просто отрыв башки.
Сам не ожидал, насколько же крутым окажется этот файтер.
Как вы наверное догадались, рисовка в стиле анимэ и она очень кавайная.
Все персонажи женские и игру это не портит, каждая нарисована по своему, со своим оружием и приёмами.
В игру добавили достаточно эротики- почти все девушки там в открытых нарядах и когда ты делаешь удар ногой, то можешь наблюдать сверхсупершикарное зрелище выглядывающих из под юбки трусиков, покачивающуюся грудь на ветру и многое друго.
Файтер хардкорный, компьютер- очень сильный соперник, даже на лёгком уровне сложности.
Можно играть с друзьями на одном компьютере друг против друга. Если вам нравился МК, Тэккен и прочее- то это вас тоже не должно разочаровать.
В общем очень советую поиграть в кавайный, красивейший хардкорный женский файтер. Повыдёргивайте патлы своим соперницам, понакручивайте им соски докрасна, послушайте прекрасные японские стоны, узрите шикарнейшие комбо с красиво прорисованными способностями и фишками каждой героини игры.
10 кавайных японочек из 10, дамы и господа. По лучшим традициям анимэ.

author: {'steamid': '76561198124770841', 'num_games_owned': 2744, 'num_reviews': 555, 'playtime_forever': 229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 173, 'last_played': 1440173226}
review:
天了噜，我真不想说自己是手残，流程很短，中等难度用其他角色能打到boss，然而boss远近轰炸，叫俺怎么近身？唯独自己也用boss角色，然后不停跟电脑boss对着放波，毕竟电脑不会像我这么耍赖，还是会换其他技能，然而其他技能发动时间较长，终于给我打过。
可惜这样只能看用boss通关的结局。貌似不同角色通关应该有不同结局剧情。但我用其他的是在是打不过最后变态的boss。
这游戏料少，无论是剧情，任务，“关卡”。短小精悍。
尤其人物，啊，很有出工口本子的潜力嘛！
大伙儿如果有本子，请私信我。以key换本。

author: {'steamid': '76561197972657212', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1436549593}
review:
มันอาจจะเป็นอะไรที่หลาย ๆ คนอาจจะลองซื้อมาเล่น ราคาไม่แพงมากนัก ไม่ว่ากันครับ . . . . . .

เกมนี้เหมาะสำหรับ
1. คอเกมไฟท์ติ้งตาไว ๆ ทั้งหลาย
2. ผู้ที่ไม่อยากเห็นตัวผู้ในเกม
3. ผู้ที่ชอบการร่วมมือ (เล็กน้อย)
4. ผู้ที่ชอบอะไรที่ไม่ยุ่งยากมากนัก

จุดเด่นของเกมนี้
1. Coor ของเรามีท่าไม้ตายด้วย
2. ท่ากดง่าย
3. เกมจบง่าย
4. เสียงอี๋อ๋า
5. ตัวละครค่อนข้างน่ารัก (ออกแบบมาค่อนข้างสวยเลยหละครับ)

จุดด้อยของเกมนี้
1. ค่อนข้างเผาพลังงานทางสายตา
2. มองตัวละครยากมาก
3. บางจังหวะ คุณจะงง ว่าโดนสวนได้ยังไง ทั้ง ๆ ที่เราซัดไปแล้ว . . . .
4. ทำให้ตาลายได้ใน 10 นาที . . . .
5. ตัวละครหลายตัวไม่มีท่าให้เข้าถึงอีกฝั่งได้โดยง่าย . . . .
6. ต่อ Combo ค่อนข้างยาก ถึงยากมาก

เกมนี้ไม่เหมาะสำหรับ
1. ผู้ที่เกลียดเกมไฟท์ติ้ง
2. ผู้ที่สายตาช้า
3. ผู้ที่อยากเห็นกล้าม ๆ และเหล่าตัวผู้
4. ผู้ที่เกลียดเสียงอี๋อ๋า
5. ผู้ที่ไม่ชอบอะไรที่มันง่ายเกินไป

ทำไมผมถึง "ไม่แนะนำ" เกมนี้ อันนี้เป็นความเห็นส่วนตัวนะครับ
ผมค่อนข้างจะมองตัวละครไม่ออก เวลามันนัวกันมาก ๆ ครับ แบบว่า มองยากมากเลย ไม่เหมือนเกมอื่น ๆ ที่เวลากด Assist แล้วเขาค่อยโดดเข้ามาช่วยเรา อันนี้เล่นเดินตามต้อย ๆ เลย บางทีบังมุมกันอีก T-T แถมเกมค่อนข้างไวขนาดนี้แต่บางตัวแทบไม่มีท่าให้เข้าประชิดเลย(ทั้ง ๆ ที่เป็นตัวละครสายประชิดมาก ๆ) ก็ ไม่รู้จะว่ายังไงหละครับงานนี้

ส่วนใครที่ไม่เห็นด้วยกับผม ก็ กดมาเล่นกันได้ถ้าหากเห็นเกมนี้ลดราคานะครับผม

ขอให้สนุกกับเกมเล็ก ๆ ที่ตั้งใจทำเกมนี้ครับ

review: I'd rate this game probably a 3/5 or so. It kinda feels unfinished to a certain degree and I've tried all the controllers in my house and none of them are supported by the game. If it had controller support it would be much better, but for now I have to use a Keypad with a small joystick on it (Tartarus) to even be able to play the game. author: {'steamid': '76561197998146968', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1449136045}
review:
Edit after recent updates:

*D-pad support is now active. Makes the game much more playable for various controllers.

*AI tweaks (final Boss fight) are an improvement. Fight is still tough, which is good, but not so extraordinarily stupid hard like before.

*Most of the old review still applies. With the new controller updates, the game is fairly enjoyable, there is a decent fighting game under the flaws and poor presentation. If this had the polish of say Skullgirls (as an example) I'd have to try and figure out how to play this one handed. I'm still a rampaging pervert.

Older review text:
Opens in a window with crap resoultion, looks like a SNES port. Menu interface is clunky, messy and hard to use. Some backgroundss over busy. Little to none information on moves, no training mode, limited gameplay options and no online play. Hard to tell sometimes who is who with 4 players on screen (you vs them, plus each have a companion) Feels cheap and nasty. I wonder why the hell this is even on Steam.

Why do I then recommend this?

Because I am a colossal pervert

Please dont hate me.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999021826', 'num_games_owned': 488, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1446427423}
review:
Pros:
-Quick pace
-Choosing a support charater offers diferent gameplay strategies
-Good animation
-Loads of fanservice

Cons:
-Loads of fanservice
-Low resolution
-Crowded screen
-Final boss is ridiculusly difficult and clutters the screen even more
-Non-existant story
-Small movelists
-No practice mode (The manual claims there is one but if it's true I can't find a way to activate it
-No online play
-Not good for people new to fighting games

I considered if I should recommend this game in spite of it's shortcomings, as there are few fighting games on steam, but compared to the competition Vanguard Princess doesn't stand out as something really worth having, especially seeing as there is no online play. You'd be better off buying Skullgirls, which is simmilar to VP, but much better done and has a lot more content, or BlazBlue, which is another 2D fighter with no online play, but at least it offers a deep, convoluted story and characters with a lot of personality.

EDIT: Apparently, there is a practice mode, but it has to be activated by a sceond player. That makes no sense. Also, the "practice mode" means the 2nd player can still control the character, and your life doesn't replenish, so you can both win the round. Even though the won round couter does not display how many turns you won, it is still saved, so when you win the second round you go back to character select. Also, the practice mode has to be turned on EVERY turn. This is inexcusable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049657470', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1434784983}
review:
Very glad I didn't technically pay for this - got it purely from stuff I sold on the community market.
Absolute garbage; do not buy it, whatever you do.
1/10, and that 1 point is only because it does have very nice animation.

There's no indication as to what controls do what, the GamePad menu in the Options is completely wrong (none of the buttons it tells you to use actually work) and you could spend hours just trying to figure out which buttons allow you to move, do a single attack or even navigate the menu which is next to impossible and has no way to cancel an input, essentially randomizing every single attempt at even trying to play the "game".

Awful attempt at a "backstory", it can easily be hacked / modded / cheated because it's made in a Baby's-First-Fighting-Game engine, and ultimately this is more of a display of the developers' animation skills than at making a serious game.

Once again, absolute garbage. Save your money and buy something else; you will NOT be entertained or impressed by this terrible attempt at a fighting game. It barely even functions and is about as broken as Air Control. To be honest, you'd have more fun PLAYING Air Control. At least that game actually works.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970064749', 'num_games_owned': 5549, 'num_reviews': 359, 'playtime_forever': 595, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 595, 'last_played': 1433962202}
review:
Vanguard Princess is a 2D animé fighting game in which you can pick one of the 10, short skirted, cute girls and start bashing eachothers heads in. 

I'm not really a big fan of animé but the game does look quite good. The gameplay is pretty neat aswell, every fighter has her own unique skills and the game simply does what a fighter should do, so there's no real problem in that department.

The reason why I will not recommend this game is because of a few reasons. 
For one, There are only two modes: Arcade and Versus mode, which would be ok if there were any unlockables or something to play for, sadly there is not so the replay value is very low. 
Also, there is no online multiplayer, you are able to play someone locally but that means you both have to share a keyboard since (in my experience) I could not get my controller to work. 
But the worst part of the game must be that the game feels (and probably is) like an emulator game. You can only change options if your game is windowed and it simply does not feel right.

Overall, Vanguard Princess is at it's core a good fighting game but not one you would spend a lot of time in.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990523893', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 271, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1433657766}
review:
Seems like a pretty good game, but with some issues.

Theres not a whole lot of moves per character, if you have issue with that. I don't as I prefer this as it becomes to much for me to remember a large or long move list.

Just like with Skullgirls I really like the art in this. Nothing looks blurry, the colors are nice, and the art in general is great. Bobbing bewbies are delicoius on some of the characters. The only issue I have is there are times when you can lose characters in a mess with the background. 

I think it maybe best to use a fight stick with this. Trying to do the moves in this really fatigued my thumb and left hand in general. I really don't usually play fighting games as they tend to be pretty disinteresting, usually you get stuck being knocked around and need to spend hours upon hours of time you will never get back learning on how to counter this in order to get to a point where you can have fun, unless you know other players at your level of play or around there which is definetly nice but unfortunately theres no online play in this release, just local and singleplayer. 

In general the game seems pretty cheap, not so much the actual game but the menus and stuff around the game seemed cheap the biggest issue being the game only running in a pretty low resolution. I couldn't find anywhere to change the settings but it wasn't a huge issue to me but your milage may vary. Also theres no ingame move list, and to pause the game you press in the right stick which is weird as hell to me.


Its not a fighter I would dump hours into especially without a move list accessible while in game, but I like it. It seems pretty cozy as a singleplayer fighter and since I probably got for next to nothing it was probably worth it. Not saying its a good fighting game, but its a good enough game to play occasionally and just waste some time with while beating on titular anime babes. Unfortunately no Peacock QT.

author: {'steamid': '76561198132829024', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1526097992}
review: So I got this game before it was out on steam, on amazon. It was actually after the day it came out, I believe. So I've had this game before I actively began to use steam and turns out I could download this game on here, which was pretty convinient I would say. I honestly didn't think Vanguard Princess was much of a hype until I attended Fanime2013 (or 2012, I forget) and there was an actual panel and game room with people competitively playing it. Well! The girls in this 2D fighter are super cute, and the move-sets are pretty impressive. I was contemplating about cosplaying one of the girls myself. I like this game a lot. However, I do wish there were achievements on it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198157955710', 'num_games_owned': 1392, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 125, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1453039037}
review:
《先锋公主》操作指南
如何开始：
1、进入游戏后选择游戏模式，与CPU对战，与朋友对战，“T”选择，“A”确定；
2、选择人物，按“F”,“H”移动光标，“A”确认选择；
3、选择游戏难度，从左至右为简单到困难，按“F”,“H”移动光标，“A”确认选择，再按一次“A”即可开始游戏；
如何操作：
游戏菜单栏option - KeyBoard 可以更改默认键位操作。
默认操作如下：T、B、F、H：控制人物移动；
A：轻脚；
S：重脚；
D：攻击；
Q：召唤；
W：隐身；
8、2、4、6（数字键小键盘）：上下左右；
J：轻脚；
K：重脚；
L：攻击；
I ：召唤；
O：隐身；
Esc：暂停。

author: {'steamid': '76561198102964733', 'num_games_owned': 3500, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1436176609}

review:
Terrible fighting game. Barely worth the £2 I spent for it.
The graphics are poorly executed, there is too much going on. The fighting is unbelievably basic. There is very little in terms of menu controls (No back button, settings ect)
I play a few fighting games and picking up a cheap one seemed sort of fun, but I was wrong.
The storyline is classic anime. Lots of stuff that makes sense in context, but only seems to be happening for the hell of it.

review:
Jogo totalmente confuso, mesmo execultando os golpes corretamente não entendia o que as personagens faziam, além dos movimentos serem travado, e a útilidade das personagens de suporte serem praticamente nulas.
Ah sem contar que não há tutorial ou diferenciação nas dificuldade do jogo.
Enfim, não vale a pena comprar nem na promoção, é só mais um jogo pra vender o corpo feminino (não que eu não goste de ver umas curvinhas, calcinhas e peitões), mas nem isso faz o jogo ficar bom.

Nota geral  2/10 (só pela bronha mesmo --')

review: Low resolution, no correct full screen mode, no stage selection in versus (you need to choose it in the menu !?)... This game lacks a lot of options to be correct. More : the last boss become almost unbeatable even in easy mode with the lilith DLC. And if you buy it only for the panties, there are far better games than this one to please you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111467538', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1578002945}
review:
Not fun when you're alone.

If you're looking for a good fighting game, this is one of them. The two on two battles is an interesting concept and may have already been done before, but this game packs a punch. 

Character designs are obviously fan-service centric, from loli to tsundere, but that doesn't make it less fun. The story mode isn't much, but its enough to get you through the basics and later the hard parts.

Have friends to play with is great as you can compare waifus and the like. An online feature can really help this game become better as the arcade mode won't take much time to finish.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007749828', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1430772918}
review:
Boobs. Boobs everywhere.

No seriously, this game is mediocre at best. Everything it lacks as a proper game it tries to make up for with half-naked girls and loli assistants. I will try my best to sum it up for you.

1. No pause option. I was using a controller and could not figure out how to pause the game. There might be some trick somewhere, but I could not find it.

2. No D-pad usage. Again, this might be a problem that you can fix by messing with the configuration, but I was unable to do so.

3. Full screen is a disaster. The maximum resolution was very low. Also, I could still see the window borders.

4. No saves. I played a little bit of the "Story" campaign. I left after a match to mess with the settings and came back to find that I had to start over. This would not be a problem if the game did not suck.

5. Again. The game sucks. I mean it is just not fun to play. The moves are limited and you have very few options.

In the end, the ONLY reason I can see people wanting to play this game is because of the anime girls. That's it. However, as a game it is simply not worth my time.

EDIT: Also I had some problems with the steam overlay, so some of my game time was not recorded.

author: {'steamid': '76561197963697914', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 267, 'last_played': 1453183080}
review:
It's fun, but lacks polish. The game runs in a windowed mode at all times, and the control scheme for keyboard play is pretty bad (A controller is advised). There's no obvious training mode. Also, the only time your movelist is visible is during chracter select, making it hard to remember specials (can't pause to see them)

Despite this, the game is fun. Both the art and music are really good, with animations being fluent and eyecatching and music being crisp and memorable (Love the guitar riffs). All the asthetics help the combat feel powerfull and fun.

For the price, I'd say the game is well worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005616599', 'num_games_owned': 785, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 107, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 107, 'last_played': 1402473459}
review:
인디 2D 여성 격투게임. 이 걸로 다 설명됩니다.

캐릭터도 많지 않고 스토리가 흡입력이 있는 것도 아니고 프로그램도 불안정한 것이 인디 게임의 한계를 여실히 보여줍니다.

격투 게임 마니아에겐 어떨런지 모르겠지만 격투 게임에 장르에 크게 취미가 없는 사람으로서는 재미거리를 찾기 힘듭니다. 

등장 캐릭터들이 얼마나 모에한가 보는 것이면 이 게임의 가치는 다 했다고 보면 됩니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985969658', 'num_games_owned': 1009, 'num_reviews': 689, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1429600371}
review: Poor man's fighting game in ever sense of the word. No options for graphics, sound. Need to use f buttons to chage screen size, that's not explained.  Controller barely works, as can't go back or go to options, or back to start menu. Sometimes pausing doesn't even work. As for the game. There is no tutorial or any explanation of any mechanic or part of the game. Seems impossible to do any moves, as the few next to people  seem overly convoluted and the button combos aren't even explained nor what the symbols for button means. There is no way to check command list. Basically just button mash. Blocking isn't explained either. The screen is super busy and it is hard to tell what is going on 2/3 of the time, whether you are winning or losing. Backgrounds and evironments are dull and look like they are from 1980, with no detail or anything going on with them. There is a support character, but once again how to use them, any possible combos, when they are charged, what they can do, none of it is explained. One time I did a special move but I have no idea how or why. The story is basically non-existant, worse than most fighting games, and if you accidentally press any button it skips it all. There is no online multiplayer, so why does this even exist. There is story, practice, and duel, and that's it. I have played many fighting games, MK, Tekken, Injustice, MVC 2, and this is the worst fighting game I have ever played. But the game does have plenty of giant anime t!ts and panty shots, per usual. So there's that I guess. But just go to porn-hub and save the 5 dollars. 5/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987391854', 'num_games_owned': 2379, 'num_reviews': 611, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1515792594}
review:
Experimentos do governo em uma jovem desencadearam uma onda de choque cósmica que dotou muitas jovens com poderes místicos. Ela ressurge no mundo e jura destruir toda a humanidade em um ato de vingança.

Um bravo grupo de garotas que abraçaram seus poderes dirige-se ao campo de batalha para enfrentá-la; não apenas pelo bem do mundo, mas para perseguir seus próprios motivos e sonhos pessoais.

Escolha entre dez garotas com habilidades de luta únicas e junte-as a um parceiro poderoso para formar uma equipe imbatível. Navegue pelas aventuras de uma Princesa Vanguarda no Modo História ou participe de batalhas frente a frente no Modo Versus.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120459048', 'num_games_owned': 609, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 606, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 582, 'last_played': 1571027524}
review:
Para quem é fã de fighting games e jogos de PC, pode-se claramente dividir este jogo em duas partes: o seu conteúdo e seu software.

E ainda mais claramente pode-se definir o software como a pior parte, mesmo que você também não goste do conteúdo.

Certo. Independente do gosto por gráficos ou não, não há um fullscreen de verdade. Só a janela do jogo no meio da tela, com muito espaço em preto em volta. Em resolução muito baixa, por sinal. A melhor opção para jogar é maximizando a tela do jogo, para poder jogar em widescreen, pelo menos. Mas este não é o único problema. Durante o modo Versus, você tem que manualmente mudar o cenário de cada luta, usando o mouse ou o teclado, caso queira alternar. Caso contrário, jogará sempre na mesma fase. O mesmo vale para quantidade de rounds. E é um pouco complicado voltar para o menu principal. Não há menu de opções in-game para configurar resolução e etc. NÃO é possível tirar screenshots ou postá-las na sua seção de screenshots da Steam, muito infelizmente. Assim como não aparece o menu Steam in-game. E NÃO é totalmente compatível com o controle, e nem possui cooperativo local (Isto está na página do jogo por não possuir modo online, e não haver a opção "multiplayer local" na Steam).

Quanto a gráficos não há muito o que falar. É, sim, excelente. Gráficos bonitos para um doujin fighting games com meninas sexy (o ponto que talvez mais tenha ajudado nas vendas do jogo ;) :peace:). Na primeira vez que joguei, fiquei um pouco confuso por causa do contraste das personagens principais, com o suporte e o fundo. Mas mexi um pouco nas configurações do meu monitor e isso não foi mais um problema. É só uma questão de concentração.

Quantidade e duração dos rounds, configurações dos controles no teclado ou no gamepad, fullscreen/janela e outras poucas opções devem ser alteradas com o mouse, em modo janela.

Dificuldade do modo História se escolhe antes dele inciiar. Há rápidas animações, diálogos, videos e histórias maneiras, por assim dizer. Muita coisa não faz tanto sentido, como algumas das rival battles. Mas acredito que esta não seja a essência do jogo.

Bom, Modo História e Versus são os únicos no jogo. Sem Practice, Online, Conquistas, Leaderboards, ou sequer um menu para configurar o som.

O que mais cativa no jogo é o modo versus. Uma vez que você e seu amigo (o jogo suporta apenas dois jogadores) se envolvem no jogo, chega a ser viciante, e pelo menos nas minhas experiências foi bem difícil "enjoar". Esse, na minha opinião, é o melhor ponto do jogo. O mais envolvente e atrativo.

Por que eu RECOMENDO o jogo? Apesar de todos os problemas que citei, o jogo é leve, o versus é viciante, as personagens são bonitas, o jogo é legal, os comandos são como os das grandes franquias de lutas, e as personagens são bem únicas. Há, sim, certos desequilíbrios, mas moderados. O jogo continua em expansão. Apesar de não alterarem as funções do jogo que supostamente deveriam ser alteradas, eles lançaram duas DLCs, que VOU adquirir e comentar sobre em breve. O que me ganhou nesse jogo foi o modo versus. E é por causa dele que eu recomendo. Gostei muito do jogo, e adoraria um modo online, seria perfeito. Além disso, modo cooperativo, modos para 4 jogadores, novos modos à maneira dos desenvolvedores, melhorias nas configurações de resolução, janela, fullscreen e etc. Opção Select Stage ou Stage randômico in-game e outras funções seriam MUITO bem vindas. Mas como o jogo não as possui, resta aproveitar o que temos, abrir o jogo, ligar os controles e jogar à medida do possível este jogo mal-lançado, porém ainda INCRÍVEL!

author: {'steamid': '76561198016646963', 'num_games_owned': 514, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1441815560}

author: {'steamid': '76561198089974969', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 385, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 317, 'last_played': 1560006901}
review:
優點:
1.畫面精美, 很多胖次
2.有打擊感, 速度感也好
3.檔案容量低, 效能需求不高
4.招式簡單易記
5.角色不少, 不同風格美少女
6.聲優配音不随便

缺點 : 
1.畫面凌亂, 胖次和角色絕招畫面, 閃動過快
2.Combo 難以連接
3.反擊困難
4.沒練習模式
5.光影閃動太頻繁, 眼睛很累
6.以單機遊戲來說, 破關無任何東西, 有點空洞
7.劇情單薄

綜合評價 : 
玩過許多格鬥遊戲, 以小品遊戲來說, 表現很好,
但是就是感覺白花錢買了這個遊戲, 玩不痛快,  
連段困難真是一大敗筆
