author: {'steamid': '76561197992135198', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1573581884}
review:
Un juego de 2014 con una resolución de 640x480 y con un 75% de análisis positivos. Lo entendería si fuese un buen juego, pero solo tiene dos modos, arcade y versus, esas dos son las únicas opciones que aparecen en el menú, olvídate del online e incluso de cambiar las opciones del juego.
Una vez más se demuestra el poder del marketing, o mejor dicho, tiran más dos tetas que dos carretas.

Si tienes la imperiosa necesidad de ver chicas anime con voces estridentes las tienes gratis en internet, pero no pretendas justificar la existencia de este bodrio de juego, menos mal que lo tengo de un bundle mierder, si hubiese pagado 5 euros por esto exigiría al estado mi ejecución pública (con el garrote vil).

PD: Si queréis buenos juegos de peleas jugad al Street Fighter, y si queréis mezclar eso con tetas por alguna razón es mucho más recomendable Skullgirls (por lo menos no es un insulto a la inteligencia en cuanto a gráficos y jugabilidad).

author: {'steamid': '76561198134146999', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1446918603}
review: Что я могу сказать про эту игру?Cиськи и ещё раз Сиськи!!)Вообщем неплохой файтинг

author: {'steamid': '76561198081428558', 'num_games_owned': 191, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1563038495}
review:
Коротко о том, как я получил эту игру!
Сижу я такой радостный утром, листаю вк, как вдруг выскакивает пост в котором написано :"ТОЛЬКО СЕГОДНЯ ЗА 100 РУБЛЕЙ ВЫ ПОЛУЧИТЕ ИГРУ ОТ 500-1000р В ELITE RANDOM".Ну ок, захожу я значит на тот самый сайт(не буду говорить, т.к это будет реклама) и читаю :" ВАМ МОГУТ ВЫПАСТЬ ТАКИЕ ИГРЫ КАК:"DAY-Z,PORTAL-2,THE CREW,ARMA 3" и т.д. Ну я на радостях побежал в магазин, закинул деньги, купил самый дорогой ЭЛИТНЫЙ рандом, жду, что сейчас выпадет мне Day-z или The Crew....А ВЫПАДАЕТ ЭТОТ ДЕРЬМО!Ну лан думаю, игра может хорошая, но нет!Этот кал настолько ущербен, что я даже не смог поиграть и 15 минут, как меня тянуло блевать...В общем вывод: НЕ ПОКУПАЙТЕ ИГРЫ В РАНДОМЕ !!!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198048429344', 'num_games_owned': 348, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 290, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 257, 'last_played': 1498931155}
review:
Este juego se asemeja mucho a lo que es el Mortal Kombat, (Peleas, ataques especiales, y, el mas notable, al terminar el arcade con un personaje, te muestran la historia con ese personaje, [spoiler] al igual que MK Armaggedon	[/spoiler]) Sin mencionar el Erotismo del juego. (Posee una version sensurada y otra sin censura , descargando el DLC)

Vamos con los [u]Pros[/u] y [u]Contras[/u]

[b]Pros[/b]
[list]
    [*] Es muy entretenido, ya que los controles estan bien logrados a la hora de usar un teclado (Solo cambie el movimiento por las flechas, para no confundirme) QWE y ASD , facil de recordar para hacer los ataques.
    [*] La facilidad para utilizar Poderes (Una vez dominados los controles) y la variedad de formas en las que tu Ayudante puede justamente hacer esto, ayudarte, es muy buena , exelente diria yo.
    [*] Cada uno puede elegir entre jugar con la version sensurada o no [strike](Se lo que estan pensando, pero tenia que ponerlo)[/strike]
    [*] Muy bien lograda la mecanica de lucha en 2D y buenos escenarios
    [*] Se puede jugar Versus Local !
[/list]

[b]Contras[/b]
[list]
    [*] A pesar de tener unos controles bien logrados, aun me cuesta entender como lograr los diagonales, por esto es mejor utilizar un mando.
    [*] Es muy facil trabar si se tiene un pequeño nivel mas alto que el oponente en cuanto a Experiencia.
    [*] Segun tengo entendido, solo se puede jugar sensurada la version base (No se si se puede utilizar los DLC y tener el juego sensurado al mismo tiempo, abria que probar)
    [*] Con los DLC, antes al jugar Arcade jugaba contra algunas chicas en sus respectivos mapas, ahora, suelen ser mapas al azar.
    [*] Para jugar Online, hay que modear el juego (Hay Guias sobre esto)
[/list]

Como dije anteriormente, este juego es como un Mortal Kombat para PC y siendo sinceros, bastante seductor y atractivo, digamos, exclisivamente para hombres (No por ser machista, sino por que son puras mujeres con poca ropa, venga que eso es bastante notable, hasta el DLC se encarga de "des-censurar") Dejando de lado esto, me gustaria aclarar que es un juego MUY entretenido y MUY recomendable.

Desde que me vieron jugarlo, un par de amigos se sumaron , a todo el que lea esto, le digo, que si le gustan los juegos de lucha, o las chicas Eroticas, ESTE es su juego definitivo alterno al MK [strike]o a la perversion![/strike]

author: {'steamid': '76561198126168524', 'num_games_owned': 519, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1487862890}
review:
前言：
一款二次元格斗游戏，打击感可以，画面绚丽，其实我第一次看到这游戏感觉还是不错得，但可玩性有点低。
--------------------------------------------------------
评分：
+打击感优秀
+画风优秀
+BGM不错

-可选角色太少
-招式多样化不够
-可玩性有点低
-玩了一段时间就厌倦了
总分：7.5/10
------------------------------------------

author: {'steamid': '76561198183800054', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 675, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 675, 'last_played': 1441727485}
review: As a fighting game player and enthusiast this game is solid. It does have some questionable design choices, like why normal attacks do not cancel into special moves at all. Which weakens hit confirms tremendously and the game is pretty bare bones in terms of its game options and modes, but the core game overall is still fun and solid. Also, once you learn how to get the most out of the game by using some of the hidden functions like activate training mode, change the game file to get a better resolution by default, and how to setup online versus play work around, Vanguard Princess will become more worth it. The true downside to this game is that developers aren't interested and don't really care about the game. They basically just took the freeware version cleaned up the menus a little bit and just tried to sell it. The don't care about the game or the community at all and they never have. The don't know anything about fighting games. I will never support their future projects. They didn't make this game, they just got the rights to it. Outside of that I would recommend this title because it is fun and at a price point of two bucks, why not?

author: {'steamid': '76561198124968154', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 227, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1427569200}
review:
Pretty fun game!  Not too difficult (then again, I only beat it on Easy Mode several times to try out some of the characters and to acquire the trading cards....I know, lame right!) and the music/sound is very good.  The characters all seem to have their own unique style and the assistants during combat (of which you have a choice at the character select screen) are a really cool idea.  

Overall, VP is a cool game and is really cheap ($5; I got it as a gift from a friend ***Thanks again Envy!*** but I'd buy it anyway for the type of game it is and for that price).  If you have a few hours to kill and enjoy 2D fighting games with a heavy anime influence then look no further.  Definitely worth checking out.

review:
Muito bom
A melhor coisa do jogo é que tem uma Loli lhe dando suporte, tem coisa melhor que isso? ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Bom vamos lá
esses são os pontos negativos e positivos que achei
1° Este jogo é otimo e precisa urgentemente de um multiplayer só pelo fato de ele ser bem curto
2° Precisa colocar um full screen descente pois esse ta horrivel
3° Cenarios e movimentação estão boas e pensar que sendo 2D taria ruim mas, está realmente bom.
4° Se acrescentar um pequeno modo historia ficaria perfeito
5° devia ter mais personagens principalmente as Lolis  ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
6° e o melhor, deveria ter conquistas e pra cada zeramento com uma personagem digamos umas 50 conquistas creio que ficava top o jogo

author: {'steamid': '76561197961521733', 'num_games_owned': 4427, 'num_reviews': 236, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99, 'last_played': 1427422791}
review:
The controller works but only the stick, not the pad. Sure you can download a tool to fix it but that should not be nessessary. It also feels rather unforgiving. Not that intuitive and the graphics are really small. 

On the plus side, it is very responsive and fast. Characters are very lively if a little over sexed. Can really recommend it just for the fighting though. Needs more options.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008516562', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 405, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 372, 'last_played': 1467664344}
review:
Short Pro/Con Summary

Pro:

+Still a rare genre (fighting game) on PC.
+Cute and funny graphics.
+Unique gameplay (fighting with main + support char. )
+Trading cards

Cons:

-Only Arcade and local VS mode.
-No online matches (except of a mod that will allow you to play online)
-No tutorials. (So it's absolutely beginners unfriendly)
-Only few skills avalable per char.
-No true widescreen support (But I don't have any probs with the stretched screen)
-No original language in ROW version. (In my opinion original language of a game should always be implemented)
-DLC Policy. (Different DLCs avalable, but the latest DLC already includes the older DLC? That's a punch into the face for people who bought the old DLC and have to buy the new one as well)

To be honest, I like this game for casual playthroughs from time to time, but sadly there are no factors that keeps up your longtime motivation.

So, only recommandable for those who wants to collect all the fighting games avalable on Steam.

*I think $4,99 USD would be a fair price if the DLCs were included in it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197980359246', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1400546598}
review:
-Getting the controls set up to be usable is a nightmare. Want to use a gamepad/fightstick? Hope you've got xpadder installed!
-The fighting system isn't really very interesting in the first place. It's just boring and generic. No one's moves really stand out as interesting or fun, IMO. This is a far cry from Guilty Gear or BlazBlue in terms of gameplay.
-Do you like scantily clad girls? Because that's this game's main selling point.

Overall, did not find this to be worth the $2.50 or whatever that I paid for it when it was on sale.

review:
I'm not going to talk about how the game mechanics are ridiculous and how the developers must've spent what seems to be only a few minutes into making this. 'Cause it does have amazing pixel art, sexy ladies fighting (ER MAH GERD FEMMENESM), oh and huge boobs. Who cares that the game otherwise is quite shettily made? (Or in all fairness, wellmade, but lazily scripted for a computer lol) 

If you're looking for a decent fighting game in the style of Tekken, you've come to the wrong place. However if you're looking for nice graphics and sexy anime pixel boobs you're at the right place. Can't dislike on boobs so I have to thumb up
(CAUSE FEMMENESM)

author: {'steamid': '76561198064713626', 'num_games_owned': 316, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 473, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 376, 'last_played': 1558262228}
review:
เกมนี้ตลอดการต่อสู้สาวๆของเราจะโชว์กางเกงในกันทั้งเกมเลย
แต่ถ้าเอาดีๆก็ระบบการเล่นนี่ต้องใช้จอยเล่นครับเพราะถ้าใช้คีย์บอร์ดเราจะกดใช้ท่าบาางท่าไม่ได้อีก
ส่วนตัวคอมที่เป็นศัตรูนี่ก็เก่งมากครับขนาดที่ว่าระดับง่ายนี่ผมแพ้ไปหลายรอบเลย(แทบทุบคอมทิ้ง)
โดยเฉพาะบอสนี่โกงสั*ๆเลยครับโกงเหี้*ๆแต่ไม่ใช่ว่าชนะไม่ได้นะครับแต่ผมนี่ตายตรงบอสไปเกิน20รอบเลย
แต่รวมๆแล้วถ้าตัดเรื่องความยากไปนี่เกมนี้นี่ตัวละครออกแบบมาน่ารักและเซ็กซี่มากครับขาหื่นนี่ห้ามพลาดเลย
แต่แนะนำให้รอลดราคานะครับเพราะเกมนี้เล่นๆไปแล้วจะทำให้เบื่อง่ายเหมาะกับเล่นขำๆมากกว่าครับ

author: {'steamid': '76561198080599829', 'num_games_owned': 527, 'num_reviews': 108, 'playtime_forever': 417, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 139, 'last_played': 1466738417}
review:
The game has a few flaws but overall it's alright. First, the game needs Achievements. I'm pretty much an Achievement hunter, and don't play many games unless they have 'em.

Second, it needs "practice mode" I don't know ANY Fighting game that do not have one to hone skills. The only way you can possibly practice is in VS mode if you have 2 controllers (or using a gamepad and keybaord, if it works like that) it's a bit difficult learning how each character works without that particular mode, that's for sure.

If you want to use an XBOX360 Controller, you'll need a 3rd party device for it to work (I.E XBOX360 Gaming reciever) it's a good thing I already owned one, otherwise, this game would be unplayable to me because I hate using the keyboard on these types of games. Some games are meant to use the kaybaord and mouse, and others a controller. if you have an XBOX360 Controller with a 3rd party device, you should be fine. 

Lastly, if you enjoy boobs, butts and pantsu, then this is the game for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005335525', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1428108751}
review: This game suffers from a number of serious flaws. First, it doesn't recognize the D pad for input which is a horrible flaw for a fighter. Also the controls that it does have aren't very responsive, especially for the difficulty that even easy mode presents toward the end. The lack of an in-game menu for options is another grevious flaw, making it impossible to adjust graphics, sound or anything else if the game is put in full screen. Also the lack of an exit option is another issue that should be dealt with. The last boss's laser spam makes it nearly impossible to approach with half the characters, making the difficulty nearly impossible for somebody just starting. The game has promise if these flaws can be addressed, beyond that it was almost a waste of time and money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051240392', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 388, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 383, 'last_played': 1580780635}
review:
El juego actualmente está completamente roto, anteriormente funcionaba bien, pero algo le hicieron que se han cargado prácticamente los controles. El mando de Xbox ni lo detecta, algo que sí hacía antes; de hecho siempre lo jugué así. 

Y respecto a la resolución, no se puede cambiar, ni tampoco poner a pantalla completa ni con bordes. Lo tienes que jugar sí o sí en la clásica ventana de Windows. Por si fuera poco, ahora va a 10 fps. Sí, has leído bien, 10 fps, jugando con una RTX 2070 y un Ryzen 2600X.

Y ni te molestes en hacérselo saber a los desarrolladores, tienen abandonado el juego.

Actualización 2020: lo volví a instalar hace un par de días por si acaso se había solucionado y NO, no se ha solucionado. He probado con otro mando, un Nacon, y tampoco lo reconoce. Hay más gente que le pasa, pero también hay gente a la que no, pero los desarrolladores parecen querer ignorar a los que tienen estos problemas, y no son pocos, precisamente.

Lo peor es que hace poco añadieron como DLC un cómic. Para eso sí que lo actualizan, para arreglar el juego no.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983650434', 'num_games_owned': 2240, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1426745086}
review:
Despite the problems I had with this game I feel it's worth a  purchase as long as you know what you're getting involved with.  This game is a doujin fighter through and through and options to adjust the game for use are limited.

The two big issues for me from a technical aspect that some may need to know about prior to purchase are...

1. The gamepad support is not proper xinput so while it will detect a 360 pad it won't work properly with it out of the gate.  Buttons register but dpad/analog sticks do not work.  You'll need a 3rd party application like xpadder to use one with this game.

2. Fullscreen (when it works...just crashes for me on win 8.1) is stretched if on a widescreen display despite what the images on the games store page imply (kept aspect ratio with borders on widescreen display.

Aside from that the game plays fine on a modern system and cheap boss aside is a pretty decent (if limited) fighter.  For 5$ you could do much worse.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028575366', 'num_games_owned': 373, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1426457717}
review:
"A boring game with technical issues; pass." 3/10

This game would be decent if it weren't such a horrible piece of trash. Which is a shame, because I could actually see myself enjoying 'Vanguard Princess' if it weren't for so many technical issues. For starters, the game says that it has 'full controller support' but when plugging in a 'Microsoft Xbox 360' controller, arguably the most popular controller used on PCs today, it doesn't read the left stick correctly, and it results in the cursor constantly strafing to the right, making the game unplayable. Strike one.

Also, when putting this game into full screen resolution, the colors become incredibly distorted, forcing you to run the game in a much smaller window. Who the hell wants to do that? 'I didn't buy this nice big screen just to run games in windowed mode' is what I imagine many people have said out loud as a result of purchasing this game. It seems to me as if the makers of this video game aren't too good at making video games after-all. Pity, with so few fighting games on Steam, and this game having some similarities to one of my favorite fighting games of all time 'Marvel Vs Capcom 2', 'Vanguard Princess' is just a big let-down. Strike two.

So finally, sick of messing around with the controller and trying to get it to work, I shut off the support, and mapped the keys using 'xPadder'. It works! Hooray! And...this game is pretty boring. The characters are all women, something I don't particularly enjoy, the combat isn't terrible, but grows old very quickly, there is no tutorial, there are limited attacks, the game is just bad. It's a shame I put so much effort, a few minutes, into trying to get this thing to run properly. Oh well, at least I got it for free. Which is more than I can say for some of you out there. Just know that whatever you do, for the love of god, don't get this game. Strike three, yer out!

author: {'steamid': '76561198182768942', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 510, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 345, 'last_played': 1495008891}
review:
A GLIMPSE OF THE PLAYABLE FIGHTERS-10 of them, not including playable dlc boss.-Hilda, which she is probably broken still and banned in a real tournament.

1. Luna-a gunslinger, bounty hunter. Able to change stances with each special melee or shot of the gun. Must maintain bullets for effective momentum. Very open to attack when reloading. If you ever played Guilty Gear Xrd, Sin is the same way, having to eat to keep strong gameplay but not as open to attack like Luna's reload specials.

2. Lilith-self proclaimed daughter of satan. Grappler, more similiar to king of fighter grapple style characters.-(Shermie or Yashiro or Clark or even Alex from sf3) She one of the funnest grapplers to play as cause of the humor she brings and the suprising power her grab specials displays. Feels like she came from Disgaea series.

3. Natalia-religious fighter with a pile bunker on her arm from an unknown nation.
Specials are like boxer from street fighter except she can go through projectile with her dash punches. Has a great command grab special to make her even more dangerous up close.

4./5. Saki and Yui-both resemble more to ky/sol of guilt gear or kyo/iori of king of fighters of this game. Both are sword wielders.
Saki can range easier with projectiles cause she has normals that summon petals fast and Yui has slower/long reaching normals/physical specials that stuns longer but she summons petals at much lower rate. They do not resemble each other what so ever in animation or appearance like those I mentioned above. What I like about them is what they should do to Ryu/Ken/Akuma.

6. Ayane-archer with waning powers. Lost her eye in the past. maybe the fastest range attack in the game. Range expert. Arrows regenerate in time-4 max.

7. Kaede-assassin with no memory of her past. A very mobile character with adon style(jaguar tooth in a way) wall attacks and plenty of feint specials.

8. Kurumi-a average looking girl with unique powers. The assist expert that does co op attacks with them. Can combo some of her normals into each other. The dlc 5th assist, I dont think she has any co op attacks with that one. Not sure about the 4rth assist either since I dont use her much.

9. Eri-Tonfa expert and a super soldier suprising enough.-you wouldnt know from what shes wearing. Close range master. Specials hit overhead or low or even behind. 

10. Haruka-mage. Another range expert. Can set up temporary walls that damage foes on contact to stall them.

4 ASSIST CHOICES if you got the free directors cut add on, dont know why you wouldnt get that free add on-(5 if you have the dlc one which isnt really worth the cash)

(Not all specials or super moves or unique normals are listed in the manual like Lilith s flame thrower. Some characters even have second supers.)

The GOOD

Gameplay
It is actually a 2d side scroll 1 on 1 with asist partners. All fighters are female. Street Fighter Third Strike parry system. Counter hit combo advantages. asist penalties also work well to make sure you cant go crazy with your helper asists.  The voice overs are jpnese.(thank god cause most dubbed va are usually bad) Combos are exact and strict which is good for serious pvp. Cannot just cancel normals into special moves, forcing players to think on how to use their assist for combos or defense.

good looking 2d fighter with detailed sprites on fighters and backgrounds. Smooth animations. 

compatible with controller pad(not sure on which ones though. I know it works with my afterglow ps3 and my wired 360 one)

Not just a broken combo crazy game like marvel vs capcom 3. Rewards great defensive play if you work hard to master it.

THE BAD 
only 2 modes.
vs offline mode(not designed well practice mode. mostly just using 2 player as a dummy) and arcade.(arcade has easy, normal and hard setting.) Needs way more modes.

Cheap last boss at the end of arcade mode. Rivals SNK s annoying bosses. Close range characters like Lilith will get destroyed a ton when you reach the boss. The easiest way to beat her is time out with range asist. A chip battle. Trying to KO her will get you killed. She has infinite helper spam too that will kill your close range approach.

Conclusion
despite there only  being 3 modes, you can appreciate the creativeness of the game. very nice looking 2d fighter. I recommend it cause it has more creativity/better looking than street fighter 4 and its only indie game too. It has alot of defensive depth which is rare on new gen fighters these days. Rewards reaction on counter hits, footies and great space control as well.-like street fighter. 3 out of 5. It would be a 4 if it had more modes of play, a great fighting game has a overall well rounded strength in all aspects, not just focused on one strength. This title has creativity/one of the best looking 2d fighters, great combat gameplay and amazing matching voice over talent to the characters.

review:
让人不爽的就是键位和那个一只站得远远的很难近身攻击的大胸女，连续的攻击根本没法靠近啊，大剑挨揍半天才出个打必杀冲过去打得太辛苦。

进入战斗之后没有暂停我觉得很恶心啊，一个电话打过来我是接大招呢还是接电话呢。

值得安慰的是合成2次徽章就掉了那两个最想要的背景真是。。。开心啊

author: {'steamid': '76561198145705795', 'num_games_owned': 1766, 'num_reviews': 300, 'playtime_forever': 2680, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2680, 'last_played': 1460892082}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198024451265', 'num_games_owned': 422, 'num_reviews': 334, 'playtime_forever': 341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 341, 'last_played': 1425220090}
review:
+ Controls are simple and responsive
+ Smooth, fluid animations
+ Boasts a noticeably enjoyable soundtrack
+ Creative and interesting character designs, something the anime community is known for

- Each playable character has no more than 6 combos
- Very low maximum resolution
- Little replay value to speak of
- Virtually unplayable without an XBOX 360 controller
- No extras or unlockables of any kind
- No online multiplayer support (there is a third-party workaround, however, that can remedy this)
- Only two modes of play (story and local co-op versus)
- Cannot view move-list in-game; only availalbe via character selection or the game's manual
- Assist characters seem clumsy in practice, have a function that is not explained at all (no tutorial or practice included), and serve more to clutter the screen and distract one's focus
- The 'story mode' is, save for a few random injections of dialogue, virtually devoid of a story at all; what little there is consists of a brief paragraph before reaching the main menu, and is not built on or developed even remotely

author: {'steamid': '76561198074672646', 'num_games_owned': 6653, 'num_reviews': 596, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99, 'last_played': 1422372477}
review:
[h1]Vanguard Princess est un jeu de baston ou de bagarre avec des jeunes femmes, uniquement[/h1]

Vanguard Princess est un jeu de bagarre où des jeunes femmes (style japonaise (évidemment, l’auteur est Japonais !) avec des tenues pour certaines très légères) s’affrontent. Vous pouvez jouer soit seul contre l’ordinateur ou bien à deux sur le même poste.

Bien sûr, ce jeu s’adresse avant tout à un public de joueurs masculins mais il n’est pas interdit aux femmes, bien au contraire ! ;)

Après, c’est un jeu de bagarre à petit prix (et en période de soldes, c’est même de l’ultra petit prix) alors ne vous attendez pas à une histoire et à des centaines de personnages.

Il y a 10 combattantes principales et 5 secondaires au choix.

J’avoue que j’ai été surpris par les combattantes secondaires, c’est la première fois que je vois ça (et ça doit être la première fois depuis XX années que je rejoue à un jeu de bagarres, ce qui explique surement cela). L’idée est excellente et si vous arrivez à gérer l’ensemble des coups et des positions de vos deux combattantes, bravo ! Je suppose que jouer sur une manette est vivement conseillé.

Bref, vous aimez les jeux de baston, vous aimez voir des nanas en petite tenue se taper dessus, alors, achetez le !

[url=www.graal.fr/2015/01/30/test-vanguard-princess-la-version-pour-steam/]Pour lire mes impressions complètes sur Vanguard Princess[/url].

author: {'steamid': '76561198018469715', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1423812361}
review:
This game is great for those of us who grew up in arcades in the 80's, if you're a fan of SNK and more specifically: the last blade, then you'll love this game.

If you're into anime stuff, then you may like this game as well.

Pros:

-Fun gameplay.
-Nice 2D animations.
-Good voice acting.

Cons:

-The game is LOUD and there's no way to adjust the volume parametters.
-No bonus nor extras, no unlocks, no art galleries, nada :(
-No online play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071807484', 'num_games_owned': 1462, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 462, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1584919893}
review:
Vanguard Princess (VG)  es un juego que esta gratuito ya desde hace bastante tiempo en la página de su desarrollador, ¿comprar esta versión vale la pena?, la respuesta es si, a medias...
En resumen este juego tiene sus pro y contras, enlistemos entonces
PROs:
+Grandiosos graficos 2D.
+Animaciones de sprites fluidas.
+Un estilo anime bien trabajado.
+Buen control y fluida reacción.
+Varios estilos de combate, ninguno se siente clon de otro personaje en el juego.
+El sistema de soporte complementa las peleas bastante bien.
+Dificultad buena.
------------------------------------------
Contras
-Personajes desbalanceados.
-Pocas opciones de jugabilidad (solo arcade, versus local y practice).
-Baja rejugabilidad.
-Nivel de la IA es incosistente (algunos personajes muy agresivos en primeras fases en contraste con el mediocre BOSS).
-Personajes con un tono subido y sugesisvos.
-Las mejoras del juego viene en DLC.

Es un juego decente pero carece de elementos que permitan sacarle más jugo, esperemos que en futuras actualizaciones corrijan esto, o por lo menos agregen versus online.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042876973', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 256, 'last_played': 1421645471}

author: {'steamid': '76561198117344873', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1430264860}
review:
Realmente é um jogo apenas para passar o tempo.
Se você quiser horas de imersão e uma história incrível que vai te fazer chorar no final.Não compre esse jogo
Porém,se você apenas está esperando muito,mas muito ecchi,com garotinhas gritando fino,semi nuas e muitas lolis com armas,e se tiver dinheiro sobrando,pode comprar esse jogo porque é exatamente o que tem nele.
O jogo em si é bem pequeno,zerei ele em cerca de 1 hora e meia,sendo que a maior parte foi pra derrotar a boss que diga-se de passagem é extremamente apelona e quando finalmente matei ela minha mão estava dormente de tanto jogar e quase quebrar o controle de raiva.
O jogo tem alguns bugs no começo e só tem as opções vs,da qual você joga contra algum amigo (se você tiver um 2º controle),e o modo história.O bug que mais me incomodou foi quando você seleciona o fullscreen uma parte da tela fica piscando no canto superior direito e deixa um pouco confuso se você tá morrendo ou não.Os gráficos obviamente não são lá grande coisa mas não é algo que desagrade os olhos.E a história.Bem,basicamente são garotas com super poderes que lutam entre si por alguns motivos bem bobos,do tipo "vou lutar pra mostrar que sou mais forte" num fundo com garotas com biquines escolares.Enfim,em resumo é um jogo que serve apenas pra passar o tempo e ver garotas e lolis lutando semi-nuas sem quase nenhum motivo.Com uma jogabilidade razoável e gráficos um tanto ultrapassados mas que dá pro gasto.Sério,só compre se tiver dinheiro sobrando ou quiser muito ver as coisas citadas acima.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013622303', 'num_games_owned': 222, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 95, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1422597199}
review:
While I'm on the fence when it comes to recommending this game, what really drags down my recommedation to "No" is consideration for players new to 2D fighting games and those just casually interested.  There is no way in hell I would recommend those players.  Given that I think Street Fighter IV's tutorial system is half-hearted, this game's complete lack of anything other than "Arcade" and "Versus" modes unforgivable.  I know it's only $5, but was a bare-bone "Training" mode that simply plopped you into a sparring match with an irresponsive but invicible opponent to much to ask for?

Also, bonus fail for forcing users to use ALT+F4 to quit the game.  How freakin lazy can one be?

If you're a 2D fighting game veteran, this [i]might[/i] be worth a quick try.  The fighting style reminds me a lot of early SNK titles....which is to say, stiff but serviceable.  The combo counter is never going to get very high, but that's OK.  The side-kick gimmick is neat -- it's not new but very few 2D fighters do it.  But just when you think the game might be OK, you face off against the final boss and run into the mother of all brick walls of difficulty spikes.  If your input device survives the ensuing rage, that's because you know when to quit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198154098102', 'num_games_owned': 711, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1423241047}

review:
It's got pretty solid fighting mechanics and the animations and art are really pretty, but... It's extremely lacking.

There is no training mode and the only way you can access your specials is by starting an arcade run or keeping the manual  open. You must change stages by accessing the options menu, which isn't even in-game. The mechanics can't make up for what it's lackong.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032386336', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1643666502}
review:
Modification de mon évaluation le 30/01/2022 :
Alors va falloir qu'on m'explique, parceque la, je ne comprends plus rien.... Les manettes sont impossible a configurer, les manettes ne fonctionnent d'ailleurs pas du tout, impossible de jouer, menu ultra bordelique c'est encore pire qu'au début ! gros foutage de gueule des developpeurs, limite un manque de respect ! De mauvais, ce jeu est passé a ULTRA MOISIT a fuir en courant !!!! J'avais jamais vu ça !
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Évaluation publiée le 5 févr. 2015 à 20h15 :
Salut. Le jeu en lui-même est un super bon jeu arcade 2D avec des perso kawaii bien bourrin, j'apprécie le style, on se pose pas spécialement de question et ça détend du slip. La ou le problème survient, c'est que le jeu est pas du tout optimisé pour Steam, ,i pour windows (pour moi le 7). Pas moyen de faire une capture d'écran par Steam, si on met en plein écran, le jeu ne s'adapte pas et les perso ressemble à des gros tas écrasés (pas de résolution d'écran) et si on utilise une manette Xbox, tout est bien config, mais le jeu, malgres qu'il nous propose de configurer nos touches, ne permet QUE de jouer avec le joystic ce qui entre nous m'agace au plus haut point sur un jeu de baston! Si je joue avec un stick, ça sera avec un stick arcade et pas celui foireux d'une manette xbox360. Bref, jeu que je conseille UNIQUEMENT pour les amoureux d'arcade 2D, et encore .....

review: Not bad at all for the short time I've played it. Highly recommend a console controller or a fight stick. I heard it's optimized for a console controller though. It's pretty good for it's price. Looks like a curator that says there's a way to get it free anyway.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065098259', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1427116614}
review:
Что ж поделать с тем, что меня радуют игры про лупоглазых женщин? 
Так вот, ничтоже сумняшеся я приобрёл эту игру.
И решил, что она вполне себе ничего так, чтобы сказать о ней: "Рекомендовал бы я в неё сыграть".
Минусы у неё присутствуют те ещё:
1. Меню такое, что я его на концерте менсона видал. Без гей(м)пада и/или соответствующей РУСКАЙ СМИКАЛАЧКИ вы из игры фиг выйдете, разве кроме как закрыв окно. Правда, наблатыкавшись, можно с этим сладить.
2. Помощницы на заднем плане, болельщики/зрители на фоне. Короче, натуральная куча-мала. Визуально дифференцировать фон, ассистенток, самое себя и противника - задача, могущая быть решенной только через длительные медитативные практики, в результате которых вы сможете видеть происходящее на экране открывшимся третьим глазом. Хотя, конечно, не всё так плохо, как может показаться с моих слов. Немножко поиграете, и свыкнетесь. И будете себя положительно чувствовать в пёстром женском месиве. 

Теперь же о достоинствах этой игры.
1. Вполне себе яркая, так что играть приятно. Радует глаз [strike] заниженный таз [/strike] (когда к пестроте привыкнешь).
2. Определённое разнообразие среди персонажей. Тут, понимаешь, и такая, и сякая, и с пистолетами, и с мечом, и с магией, и с медвежонком, и спортсменка-комсомолка. Совмещение элементов фантастики и фентези - идея не совсем новая, но достойная. 
3. Геймплей вроде как обычный для мочилок, но что-то меня в нём порадовало. Что именно, сказать затрудняюсь, но как-то весьма приятен мне показался процесс мордобития.

Резюме будет таким: игра не особо выделяющаяся, умеренно-оригинальная, в некоторых аспектах косячная (однако, в пределах терпимости), при этом яркая и чем-то почему-то приятная. Не "на любителя", а скорее просто нормальная (а тому самому пресловутому любителю может даже явиться отличной).
Я бы оценил так: 
Для критично настроенного игрока - 6-7/11
Для простого игрока - 8/11
Для любителя - 9/11
[spoiler] Для отсталого анимудeбила - 32948834252354238954/10 ЕТА ЖИ АНИМЕ И ТУТ СИСИ!!)))00))00))))) ТА ШТА НУЖНА ТАКАМУ ИЗВРОШЕНЦУ И ПСЫХУ КАГ ЙА))))00)00)))))[/spoiler]
(однотипное "мнение" последних лучше во внимание даже не брать, но...)

P.S. Да, жаль, что тут нет возможности долбиться по сети. Было бы дыщно.

review:
Vanguard princess is a fighter game 2d style with anime influenced characters to play it.
The game lacks a tutorial of any kind, pretty much as soon as you run the game you're fighting already, the only good thing of this game might be how well done are the models taking aside how much skimpy they wanted them to be.
Can't honestly recommend this game unless you're a hardcore fighter gamer who's willing to overcome any flaw for the sake of the genre.

review: I bought this from GMG for $2 and still feel like I wasted money. Despite the lovely sprite work and creative characters, this has some of the worst fighting I've ever had the displeasure of experiencing. review:
I bought this game on a whim.

Next thing I know, I've been playing for 34 minutes straight with my brother, almost skipping lunch, shouting at the top of our lungs because neither of us knows how to do specials, and mashing all the buttons on our keyboard trying to figure out how to play the game.

review: Pomijając drobne problemy techniczne (TRAGICZNA obsługa pada) i ubogość "opcji" (naprawdę, pod tym względem jest dostępne tylko absolutne minimum. 2 TRYBY?) - gra jest świetna. Dobra gra, choć bez problemu dałoby się ją polepszyć.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025283341', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1422215767}
review:
There were some things that stood out to me immediately upon playing this game, and while the artwork is great, and the girls are unbelievably cute, that's no excuse for some of the most important features this game is missing, ESPECIALLY since they're basic fighting game features.

One of the first things I like to do in a fighting game is hit up training mode, which this game lacks, to familiarize myself with the controls, which by default, are incredibly awkward, even if you use an Xbox 360 controller, like myself. It makes it somewhat annoying to have to go into the arcade mode or the non-existant versus mode to be able to get familiar with a character and how she works (Multiplayer seems to be local only, which in this day and age, is a big no-no for any fighting game). The controls can be customized, of course, so the awkward controls can be fixed, but the interface for it could stand to be adjusted so you can tell what button is being mapped to where.

This game also lacks the Steam interface, so people can't really take screenshots and show them to friends, but if anyone wants to see what the game looks like, the store page does a fine job of that.

So one of the bigger deal breakers for me with this game was the obvious lack of online multiplayer. I'm not someone who enjoys playing VS the AI over and over, and I certainly don't play them for the "deep" story, multiplayer is always the main selling point for me in a fighting game, because for me that is where the fun is at. I believe you CAN play this game in multiplayer, but you have to work for it, which just doesn't seem worth it to me with how many steps are involved, and the fact that this game would have no servers should you go through with it.

That said, the game is fairly pretty to look at, the girls are very cute, and the movesets are pretty interesting and fun. The game has an assist system, which is a bit reminiscent of Marvel vs Capcom 1, only your assist doesn't run out. It has nice voice acting, and some nice stages, and the artwork is great so it has that going for it.

Personally for $5 (lower during sales, of course), it's certainly not a bad deal if you don't mind just playing through story mode and ogling pretty girls, but I just can't recommend this without a proper training mode or online multiplayer. It certainly does have some huge potential to be a great fighting game, however.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053688651', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1575341181}
review:
Get a proper gamepad or arcade stick for this title. While it plays fine with the latest keyboards, those still using vintage PS2 inputs might find it hard to execute proper move sets. author: {'steamid': '76561198105589029', 'num_games_owned': 423, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1444251085}
review:
Итак vanguard princess, сразу скажу что игра хорошая. Почему? Сейчас расскажу.
главная причина это механика. Она очень простая, при этом уникальная. Это становится заметно уже на этапе выбора бойцов, ибо надо выбрать сразу двух, один основной, а другой саппорт. В бою у сппорта автоматически заполняется собственная шкала готовности, которая стакается до пяти раз эти стаки можно тратить на отельные приёмы для каждого саппорта. С основными бойцами всё как класичеких файтингах главное освоить приёмы, подстроиться под вражеский тип атак и вовремя атаковать.
 P.S. не забывайте настравиать управление под себя, иначе сломаете руки

author: {'steamid': '76561198139182951', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1514516304}
review:
Juego Muy bueno sin duda, con una buena jugabilidad, ademas de una alta dificultad, que incluso necesitaras tener tecnica para mejorar el control de cada personaje del juego, al igual que los Supports. Tambien me hubiera gustado mas modos de juego en ves de 2, y ojala algun dia un modo online ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561197999706674', 'num_games_owned': 1182, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 107, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 107, 'last_played': 1421568862}
review: Vanguard Princess to bijatyka anime, stworzona i zaprojektowana przez jednego twórce - Tomoaki Sugeno. Projekt ujrzał światło dzienne 26 czerwca 2006 roku. Według wikipedii gra jest freeware, lecz steam każe sobie za nią płacić (na szczęście są karty!). Ja grę otrzymałem za darmo. Nie obsługuje ona pada, musiałem używać klawiatury - olbrzymi minus ode mnie.  Nie spodobało mi się także to iż gra odpala się bez nakładki steam w jakimś archaicznym oknie, które można powiększyć, lecz nie można zmienić rozdzielczości... Po uruchomieniu naszym oczom ukazuje się biedniuutkie menu bez opcji. Grafika jest prosta, dwuwymiarowa czyli szału nie ma, ale jest całkiem nieźle. Oprawa dźwiękowa czasami potrafi zdenerwować, lecz generalnie jest ok. Może i nie jestem fanem ani bijatyk ani anime ale cały zamysł gameplayu nie przypadł mi do gustu. Niby mamy swojego bohatera a za nim stoi jakaś druga postać, która według gry też uczestniczy w walce (2v2) ale jednak nie jest grywalna, ładują się nam specjalne moce ale niestety, nigdzie nie jest napisane jak ich użyć. Rozgrywka wydaje mi się chaotyczna i niejasna.  W grze brakło mi swoistego tutoriala, który mnie - gracza świeżego w temacie oprowadziłby za ręke po świecie japońskich wojowniczek. Osobiście pograłem dwie godzinki, po czym zrezygnowałem... po prostu nie mój klimat. Natomiast jeśli ktoś kocha japonie i mange/anime to może śmiało spróbować swoich sił. W mojej opinii hańbą dla tekkena czy też mortal kombat byłoby polecnie tej gry moim znajomych, dlatego taka a nie inna decyzja.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076888673', 'num_games_owned': 377, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 102, 'last_played': 1420836451}
review:
Típico jogo de luta de meninas peitudas brigando sem um motivo aparente e fazendo gemidos enquanto se batem. Seria um bom resumo do jogo, mas ele vai um pouco mais a fundo. Vanguard Princess obviamente não é um jogo muito grande, ele consta de 11 (onze) personagens jogáveis, garotas para ser mais exato, vestindo trajes, digamos, um pouco curtos. Fora as personagens jogáveis, em cada batalha o jogador pode escolher um suporte para lhe ajudar durante a batalha (bem fofas por sinal).

Não posso dizer que é um jogo repleto de combos e cenários magníficos, porque não é, possui combos muito simples e poucas habilidades, mas consegue te prender durante algumas horinhas, até conseguir "zerar" com os personagens. Fora que as habilidades de algumas personagens especificas são bem apelativas, tornando a batalha digamos... irritante. No geral, é um bom jogo para o seu tamanho, da para se divertir com um amigo em casa, ou sozinho para passar o tempo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198168644175', 'num_games_owned': 191, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 624, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 486, 'last_played': 1438398159}
review: The responsive controls, simple moves, and the colourful graphics are amazing for just $5.49 smackers. The lack of modes such as story, survival, TRAINING, etc. The action gets too intense that I have trouble who is doing what, the command list per move set per character, lack of options,  and....HILDA (a copy of Mildred from Arcana Heart to the next level)! Puts this game down. I had it up to here with modern fighting games that makes last bosses that put the snk mvs difficulty setting to shame.  This game will make you rage quit when you get to *looks to the left then right* HILDA!

author: {'steamid': '76561198138609468', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1421571221}
review:
игра на первый взгляд кажется интересной. после запуска кажется совсем не интересной. во время игры ощущение интереса немного возвращается, но скорее по части визуального оформления вообще, чем по самой игре. 
как такая - игра не интересная. файтинг сущностью никакой: бои не интересны и скучны. если пытаться адекватно использовать приёмы или просто драться- никак не побить компьютер. если бить одним и тем же приёмом, то проходится буквально за пару минут на лёгкой сложности. создаётся впечатление, что была какая-то задумка впихнуть в файтинг какую-то сюжетную линию (типа как в стрит файтерах), но она толком не ясна и даже не сделана. к персонажам присутствуют описания, которые тоже выглядят какими-то дешёвыми. скудность фонов и персонажей вообще. есть уйма бесплатных файтингов абсолютно разных годов выпуска гораздо более проработанных чем этот. 
единственный плюс - рисовка. в целом красиво, анимэшно, эротишно. хотя и это тоже скучновато. 
в общем - понравиться может или на пару минут, или диким анимэ фанам, которым всё равно на что смотреть.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987960305', 'num_games_owned': 1477, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 104, 'last_played': 1421385958}
review:
Been playing this game a while (since before it was localized) and after putting enough time in it you just learn that its not a very good game. Multiplayer and practice mode are deeply hidden in the game, alternate costumes follow the Marvel style guess what button gets you what costume, and combos 100% rely on juggling an opponent in the corner. There is no proper way to handle zoning since the invicibility frames on a parry are stupidly easy to punish and parrying serves little purpose since all it does it open your opponent up for an attack with extremely low frame startups, which you can't follow up with due to the poor combo system.

Just stick to KOF/Blazbad if you like 2D anime fighters and stick to USFIV and DOA if you like 3D fighters.

fap+uninstall/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197960570011', 'num_games_owned': 360, 'num_reviews': 134, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1421325405}
review:
Vanguard Princess是一款2D格鬥遊戲，輸入指令都是一些很基本的不會太複雜，比較有趣的玩點是反擊中的話對手會半倒或是浮空可以COMBO，不過一些招式感覺重複感很重，設定上不太嚴謹

人物畫風是很標準的日式美少女風格，連日式殺必死精神也不少(一堆小褲褲:3)
除了本身的人物外還有輔助角色可以選擇(都是可愛的蘿莉:Q舔舔)，如何巧妙利用時間差達成連擊一直都是這種1+1FTG的要點

遊戲模式非常貧乏，OP之後就只有兩個選項STORY MODE和VS(單機雙人)，沒有連線模式!
解析度也沒得調，除了視窗化之外就只有全營幕
手把支援度也很低，我插MadCat六鍵格鬥手把它抓不到，插360手把居然只有香菇頭可以用

遊戲本身還算有趣(假如你常玩格鬥的話，因為AI難度不低)，雖然本體很便宜但是不太值得原價購入，可以等入包或50%OFF以上再入手

author: {'steamid': '76561198043728935', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1421308201}
review:
Let's start off by saying the first ever time I didn't recommend a game in a review and i won't be using the typical CONs/PROs thing;

[b]Vanguard Princess[/b] is a 2D Fighting Game with a retro-like fighting style, in which you can't do much combos and stuff(Something I dislike as a Skullgirls and Street Fighter player) that is really hard to deal with, and what helps with that is the fact that this game has no tutorial, no training mode, basically as you enter the game you find yourself with only 2 choices: [b]Story Mode[/b] and [b]Versus Mode[/b], nothing else.The game has a pretty awful UI and HUD, something out of some flash game created in 2 minutes, In my opinion they spent all the budget on the ecchi animations and sprites you want to buy the game for and just forgot about all the rest.

Let's get to the [b]fighting system[/b] itself.The game is totally optimized for a controller, not even for an Arcade stick, but you can still use your keyboard(Altough inputs are received quite poorly).
The kind of fighting in this game is nothing like modern Fighting games, Something I can't really explain in words(You should check out some videos) and I'm not saying it's bad or I dislike it, because I actually enjoy it, but playing it with a keyboard is a pain in the ass.
For example, you'll fail performing a special at least 7 times out of 10, and fail in performing some of the half-circle ones and do totally another one.But if you tryhard on all of this and just try to learn timings and such, it's a really fun game, especially because you have lots of different characters(Ranged, Melee, Grab-only and so on).
Then you have Support characters(Something i didn't see since some Naruto games on PS2) that have different kinds of attacks that you execute(Stuff like shielding, firing projectiles).

[b]The story mode[/b] is something bad overall.It's confusing, you don't really get to know the heroines' stories nor the support characters', but you bought the game for boobies, you wouldn't care about the story anyways ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) but as a reviewer i gotta cover that too.

The story mode is standard, you have 3 difficulties(Easy, Normal and Hard) and you just fight the characters in the game, sometimes you even see some dialogue scenes before fighting, and then reach the final boss, Hilda Rize.
THE BOSS FIGHT AGAINST HER IS SOMETHING SO ANNOYING that you'll try to exit the game(Oh i forgot to say that it's IMPOSSIBLE to quit the game, you have to Alt+F4 pretty much) because of the constant SPAM of fast projectiles, explosions and stuff she throws at you and she even has near-infinite SUPPORTS.For example, for me it takes at least 10 tries with each character to finally beat her and once you do it you see some ending cutscenes and that's all.No achievements, no rewards, no unlockables, nothing.You just have to stay there and cry thinking of the time you wasted and the honor you lost by losing 100 times to Hilda.

[h1]Vote: [b]6/10[/b][/h1]
In the end, the game is quite fun, but it's way too poorly-made and doesn't even deserve the discounted price in my opinion.But that's just me, if you want to kick some ass while staring at some bouncy goodness, get the game.But trust me, it will kinda disappoint you.

review:
Is this a joke? The game appears in some window with no steam overlay, only an arcade mode and versus mode, no practice which is vital in a fighting game. Stages must be chosen by windowing the game and clicking on the options tab, this is ridiculous. No online, not as ecchi as it looks, the game looks like some pre-alpha. The assist characters are confusing and player characters are unbalanced. 

Good thing I got this for free. Adds more games to my library for more cards and more steam exp. I guess all the positive reviews are horny otakus or trolls.

review:
Отличный файтинг в стиле аниме, но и понравится тем кто просто не прочь поглазеть на прелести ;3 Разачарован только в одном: в описании говорится что игра 2х2, я думал что ты можешь с другом играть в одной команде, но на самом деле - нет. С тобой будет еще кто то как поддержка, с помощью кнопки 4 (розовый цвет, не знаю какая форма) на джойстике, поддержка начнет атаковать, но не ждите что она снесет много хп.
Минусы: разрешение игры нельзя поменять (хотя можно врубить на полный экран).

author: {'steamid': '76561198047352573', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 164, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1421034299}
review:
I cannot in good conscience recommend this game to even my worst enemy. I'm sorry, but this is perhaps the worst 2d fighter I've ever played, and that's really diappointing. I really wanted this game to be good, I even got all the dlc so I could play it entirely from the start. But don't follow my footsteps. There are problems in every aspect of this game.

There is no way to adjust or mute the sound. The plot and dialogue are mediocre at best, a generic plot with a dues ex machina that only really differs in one dialgue and the very ending.

If you go into vs against a standstill enemy, and master the moves, then SOME of the following can be bypassed. But not much. 

Gameplay:
The gameplay can be broken down into three things. The AI, balance, and controls. All three are completely broken in this game.
The AI will spam attacks constantly, and with the final boss this means no way to get in close to her. They each spam their specials and support, all of which have some way of being unstoppable. For example: There is a character who can deal 35% of your max health in one hit that has the range of the entire screen. There is another whose specials are all grabs that cannot be stopped mid-grab. The final boss' attacks are all at range, with the closest being just further than the melee-only character's heavy attack. The support lolis will stun you just long enough for the spamming AI to get a hit and stunlock you. This creates a fight that REQUIRES you to either button mash or spam your own move, both of which will fail unless you also get very lucky.
There is no balance whatsoever. As I stated above, there is a character with a max range attack that deals 35% of full health per hit, and has to be ducked to dodge. The final boss has the exact same attack, and so many attacks that can hit you no matter where you are that she can combo you in three hits to kill you right when the match starts. That character's AI will spam it quite often, locking you in place. The grab character will complete the grab whether you attack her halfway through or not. Any attack hitting her will just trigger it. The final boss will spam ranged attacks and her support to the point where even standing up is near impossible. 
The following is what can be bypassed by vs mode.
The controls are the ultimate sin of this game's gameplay. The AI and unbalance could be bypassed if it were actually possible to play well. But the controls are set so that you have a light, middle, and heavy attack buttons, as well as a parry button and a support button. There is also a button that is literally set as the "no action" button. Meaning yes, there is a button that's sole purpose is to do nothing. This would be fine, except that hitting combinations of the light and middle attack buttons will trigger the parry, despite there being a button specifically for that. Given how difficult it is to avoid the AI's broken attacks long enough to actually attack, making a really easy mistake and wasting an opening with a parry will lose you the match very easily. Add to that how the controls for super moves and specials don't read quite right (though this could admittedly be my keyboard's fault) and the result is a necessity for spamming a single special move just to stand a chance of surviving. 
The control explanations are useless, as they call the buttons A, B, C, and X, yet when setting controls it doesn't say which each button equates to. It simply tells you what the button does, but not if it's meant to serve as A, B, C, X, or anything else. In other words, using any special whatsoever requires a lot of trial and error just to figure out, and in the middle of being stunlocked by the AI, that's very difficult. 

In the end, you'll end up finding a special for each character and just learning the timing for each character's standing up so you can spam it without them being able to get you into a stunlock yourself. 
Hopefully this game will get a major overhaul and balancing, but unless it does, don't buy it unless it's on a really good sale.
I really hate giving negative reviews to anything, but this game needed one. I'm sorry.

review:
Let's be honest, if you've gotten this far you're not in it for the game, you just want to see some pantsu shots.

As for the actual game, it's awful; clunky controls, serious lack of mode options or options in general, forced 640x480 resolution, practically non-existent/pointless story.  The only redeeming factor is that the character designs are nice, but only nice, not anything too impressive.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057353338', 'num_games_owned': 793, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1420846106}
review:
Na moral, não gostei. O jogo é bonitinho colorido e não peca na arte, mas no jogo em si para mim não deu certo.

 Para começar a primeira impressão que tive foi de que não dava para ver o que estava acontecendo, o que eu estava fazendo, o que o inimigo estava fazendo... diria que o jogo é bem apressadinho e o seu personagem consegue se "misturar com a plateia". 

 Os golpes especiais são estranhos as vezes, no sentido de que o jogo tem 3 botões de ataque e determinado mesmo especial tem por exemplo meia lua+ A ou B ou C, na hora que fui tentar isso não deu muito certo e foi confuso.

 Ache ruim se quiser mas não quis insistir muito  nesse jogo, não vou dizer que ele é um daqueles jogos de luta 2D que você sai metendo especial adoidado e comba só um pouco e nem que é o contrario porque nenhum dos dois deu certo para mim. 

 Se você pegar o jogo vera que no fim é um jogo simples sem muito frufru, o artista fez um trabalho bacana mas acho que faltou algo nesse sistema de luta eu pessoalmente não gostei, de repente as coisas ficam confusas e eu não sei até que ponto o jogo quis fazer diferente dos outros jogos ou se faltou algo. O jogo funcionou tranquilamente com meu controle de xbox 360( só digo isso porque vi alguem comentar que faltava algo a respeito disso)

author: {'steamid': '76561198055497785', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1422523089}

author: {'steamid': '76561198155870927', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 1095, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1011, 'last_played': 1466620366}
review:
+
Graphics
Music
Stages (Beautiful, varied backgrounds)
Character choice (Fighting styles to suit any type of player)
Short and sweet special attack list for each character
Fewer instances of "inescapable" combos than other fighters
Arcade mode is not impossible (unlimited continues)

+/-
Little backstory, Lots of fanservice
No Steam achievements (Some like the prestige, others don't like the pressure to 100% complete a fighter)

-
No (official) online support
No (native) D-pad support on gamepads (you will have to use xpadder or similar if you don't like analogue sticks or keyboard controls)
Lack of game options (just local PvP and Arcade)
Full screen doesn't work properly on W8/8.1 (windowed full screen works)


7/10 - Worth it, but best to wait for a sale.

Update: You can fix the full screen issue by downloading Borderless Gaming 7.8 (free) and adding the game to its favorites list.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039468750', 'num_games_owned': 1802, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 1326, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1326, 'last_played': 1421165409}
review:
[h1]优点[/h1]
尚可的搭档系统
[spoiler]欧派[/spoiler]
[spoiler]胖次[/spoiler]
[spoiler]肉[/spoiler]

[h1]缺点[/h1]
打击感不佳
搓招设计不佳
角色特色不够明显

[h1]打分[/h1]
[b]5/10[/b]（2D横版格斗·卖肉）

[h1]评价[/h1]
这就是个打着格斗游戏名号的卖肉游戏，说实话玩这个我还不如去玩全女格斗，就连国产搞笑格斗游戏东东不死传说都比这个有趣。唯一的亮点的搭档系统，还算是为对战增加了一点策略性，但从另一个角度来看这种设计反而更让角色的特色低下。
话说回来还真是对自己游戏质量有自知之明，变成了进包公主。既然是免费送的，那就给个好评得了，挂卡挂卡~~

author: {'steamid': '76561198097722609', 'num_games_owned': 246, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 80, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1471024350}
review:
*sigh* I REALLY wanted to like this game, I REALLY did.. Unfortunately, I couldn't, and for a multitude of reasons.

First off, let me soften the blow with the positives. The game itself is VERY fun to play. See, I'm trying to look around and find some anime fighters to get into. Now, I know this is in no way similar to games like BlazBlue or Guilty Gear or any of those mainstream fighters, but y'know, I was more than willing to try this out, and when I did play it, I genuinely enjoyed it. The game style is simplistic, but hard to master, and I respect fighters like that. Kind of reminds me of old school fighters where you aren't necessarily trying to be combo heavy (Like... Samurai Showdown, for a good example), and I like that, considering I played the grappler character Lilith. The game looks REAL good for an anime game, but I don't particularly care for graphics in ANY game. All in all, the game is good.

Now, let's talk about the faults. No, there are no faults in the gameplay or anything like that, the faults come into some of the things that occur when trying to set up the game. First off, this has very specific controller support, from what I read. I use a Rock Candy  Xbox360 controller for all of my controller support games, one in example being Skullgirls, which is another fighter I play on here. I've tried setting it up in the menu and everything, no dice. To play with said controller, I had to download some sort of program that allowed my controller to do what I want by setting each button and direction to a certain direction. This took me about.... 20 minutes to set it up alone and tweak it to a comfortable level. Next up, full screen for this game isn't truly full screen... You can put it in fullscreen, but it's just a fullscreen version of the windowed version of the game, meaning that you can still see the menu options that appear when it's on windowed on fullscreen, and again, this wouldn't be much of a problem if the ratio for it all wasn't something like 640x480, which makes it look... Weird in fullscreen. You're better off maximizing the window if you want the screen that big. I'm not going to insult the fact that there's no netplay for this, because there *kinda* is, which requires you to download a certain program which I have had no wish in wanting to try.

This game is fun, it really is, and I love anime girls as much as the next guy (especially THESE ones.... Too bad the one I play is the loli character), but breaking it all down, the thing that destroys it all is trying to set this all up. If you have a Xbox 360 controller, go play Skullgirls or something else, because it's gonna be a pain in the neck for you to try and set up. Gameplay wise, I give this game an 8/10, this is definitely a cool game, from the animations to the different play styles, but as a Steam Game (meaning is it worth buying and everything), I'd have to give it a... 4/10. It pains me to say that because the game is definitely a fun experience, but still... I got it on sale for $2.49, and in the end, I feel it was a big waste of money.. Sorry, Vanguard Princess, I loves ya, however, there were too many faults to prevent me from enjoying you for more than the hour I played.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055391782', 'num_games_owned': 270, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 83, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1420889648}
review: Вчера получил бесплатно этот трешак. Обычно я такое не запускаю, а тут решил потестить. В общем перед нами 2D файтинг, перед которыми всякие Мортал Комбат, Теккен, Стрит Файтер, Инджастис отдыхают. Вы выбираете девушку и идете проходить кампанию. Рядом с каждым бойцом саппорт (у финального босса 2 саппорта, которые между прочим нехило дамажут). Помимо саппорта на экране еще куча посторонних людей, из-за которых порой теряешь своего персонажа. Как управлять своим саппортом я так и не понял, хотя протыкал все кнопки. Правда один раз мой саппорт выпустил какое - то сердечко, но второй раз повторить это чудо у меня не получилось. На легком уровне кампания проходится минут за 15. Так что если вы ищете игру, которую можно пройти за 15 мин нажимая две кнопки, то это игра для вас. не говоря уже о том, что порой когда девушки сражаются у них мелькает нижнее белье. GOTY.

review:
Das Game ist nur was für wirkliche Hardcore Anime Fans alle anderen sollten sich nach besseren Beat em Ups umschauen.
Die Präsentation ist schon sehr nett und macht Laune mit all den knapp bekleideten Girls aber alles andere ist absolut unterirdisch. Das Kampfverhalten besteht fast nur aus Button-smashing weil die Gegner immer die gleichen Kombos aktivieren und was das alles wirklich schlecht macht ist der Fakt das sich keine Optionen zur Resolution einstellen lassen, so ist alles megapixlig und sehr kantig.

Für Lau wie ich das Game geschenkt gekriegt habe ist es ok, aber kaufen wäre wirklich zu viel verlangt...

ein Anime beat em up? Klar wieso nicht. Aber dann bitte richtig.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000125770', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1642999328}
review:
Play this if you love fighters, well animated and designed sprites, and rock solid mechanics that hold up in play. Don't play this if you think series like King of Fighters is hard for you to learn. Also don't buy this unless you have local friends and competition because it doesn't have online matchmaking as far as the normal purchase goes.

This is not Marvel or even Skullgirls and it may not even have much in common with current era Street Fighter. It's good old fashion SNK mentality and hard as balls combos. Or you could just play Lilith and use her command grab. But the universal assist system is probably Vanguard Princess' greatest selling point, even if there are only roughly three to four assists to pick from.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037002672', 'num_games_owned': 1134, 'num_reviews': 274, 'playtime_forever': 506, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 506, 'last_played': 1420865142}
review:
1. Бесплатно получаешь игру на раздаче.
2. Устанавливаешь.
3. Играешь или тупо запустив сваливаешь по своим делам.
4. Выбиваешь 5 карточек и продаёшь по 4 рублей за штуку, итого + 20 рублей на аккаунте! Так и делают миллионы! :D 

Вообще, вполне норм файтинг. Фанатам аниме должен прийтись по душе. 
Во всяком случае, присутствует жанр "этти" и прелести прекрасного пола не могут не радовать! Ооооо, эти завораживающие глаза которые так и подпрыгивают при каждом движении ( . )( . )!

Большой плюс в том, что игра поддерживает контроллер. Ибо в подобные игры на клавиатуре крайне неудобно играть. 
Кстати, можно играть по локальной сети или на одном компьютере, что очень даже неплохо.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019409753', 'num_games_owned': 2097, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1420801869}
review:
Kiepska bijatyka w stylu pedo-anime zrobiona na modłę Gulity Gear ale o dwie klasy gorsza. Mało opcji, dwa tryby gry ("fabuła" i 1 na 1). Bijemy się w formule 1+1 czyli główną postać wspiera jedna z dodatkowych która z backgroundu zadaje na nasze polecenie dodatkowe ciosy. Oczywiście rywalka też ma taką możliwość, wychodzi 1+1 vs 1+1.
Stylistyka czysto japońska + walczymy jako cycate szpile i chude patyczaki a wszystkie lolitki roznegliżowane na granicy przyzwoitości i zdecydowanie o seksualnym podtekście.
Grafika nawet ładna, choć prosta. Wybór postaci nie za szeroki, a sama walka jest całkiem nieźle skomponowana ale bardzo mocno przeszkadza chaos graficzny między pierwszym planem na którym stoją nasze fajterki, drugim gdzie stoją ich pomocnice a trzecim czyli całą resztą. Oczopląs jak przed regałem w markecie, a wystarczyłoby pewnie przytłumić barwy na drugim tle. 


Generalnie mała, drugoligowa bijatyka. Pograć chwilę można jeśli nie mamy czegoś lepszego pod ręką. Na Steamie z podobnych na pewno Guilty Gear i BlazBlue sprawdzą się o wiele lepiej.
Pykałem na klawiaturze i nawet się da, do walki wykorzystujemy tylko 5 przycisków funkcyjnych.

Scrafciłem karty i żegnam ozięble.
4/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198041966150', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 231, 'last_played': 1420810105}

author: {'steamid': '76561198048752110', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 95, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1420778421}
review:
I'm going thumbs up on this one, but you should really be aware that It has some major hangups that you'll have to deal with.

-first of all, this game is TERRIBLE, and I mean TERRIBLE about recognizing controllers. I'm using a 360 gamepad and it would just lose its shit all over. Sometimes it wouldn't work, sometimes it would pick up on buttons but not the stick, sometimes it just wouldn't do anything. You can still play with the keyboard, but keyboards + fighting games = a pain in the ass usually. With all this said? I managed to sorta-fix it by downloading Joy2Key, which is a free thing that lets you map keyboard inputs to a controller. 
- Once you do that? Then.... well it still misbehaves pretty often, I have to skip the title sequence with JUST THE RIGHT TIMING to be able to have full control. I don't know why it works that way. It's probably different for everybody with different controllers.

+ BUT. ONCE YOU GET IT TO WORK? It works very well. I picked this up on the anime sale on whim. I won't lie, an ecchi/loli fighting game for 2.50? There are worse ways to kill an afternoon. It's a basic fighter with only Arcade and Vs, so you get what you pay for. The sprites and backgrounds look fantastic in motion and the companion system is neat.
+ I also don't think it's really THAT explicit as some other reviews make it out to be. Unless there's some super-hyper-girls-make-out move I'm missing. 

In the end, it's a perfectly serviceable fighting game for a budget. If you're willing to power through the bugs, then there's certainly some fun to have here. Even if you only plan on goofing with it for a few hours.

author: {'steamid': '76561198146771067', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 345, 'last_played': 1424935923}
review:
Although the amount of hours I have played is not long at all, this is a good game for a more casual gamer. It is sort of similar to Tekken and Street Fighter in the sense of button mashing. This game is hard, even on easy, unless you know how to perfect combos and know them inside out. I'm still trying to learn to make combos and perfect the game but this is a really good game. It's quite cheap and it goes down even more on sales ( I got it for $2.49).  Plus, you have to love the arcade/retro design in some characters for character select.

BEST OF ALL - RUNS ON TOASTERS! 
My computer is now 6 years old and when I got it, it wasn't that good either. 2GB RAM OP nerf pls.

author: {'steamid': '76561198117399271', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 816, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 734, 'last_played': 1421759532}
review: As with other 2D fighting games, there are many combos and different strategies for winning. With Vanguard Princess, I felt very challenged. Pulling of combos is actually quite difficult. One thing the game lacks is online multiplayer, which kind of sucks. Aside from that, the game has cute characters, colorful background environments, and a decent soundtrack. 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197997908509', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1686314133}
review:
Street Fighter IV looks slow after playing this most colorful of 2D fighters. The final boss is the worst i've ever seen, constantly spamming energy attacks over the entire screen. Still, i've beaten her as herself (with the exact same color scheme..).

Besides the confusing boss and controls (Alt+F4 to exit from fullscreen), my only gripe is the lack of Steam screenshot support.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069586968', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 373, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 173, 'last_played': 1605292413}
review:
If you are hesitant in buying this game .. DO NOT BE!

Pros:

- Cheap price
- Full Game
- Interesting, fun and chaotic fighting
- Contains a bit of story
- Nice soundtrack
- A few interesting and memorable characters
- Deep move list ALL certain characters
- Lolis - If that's how you roll-
- Pantsu ! 
- Nice combat
- The combat is incredibly deep and requires dedication to really see the end of, fighting game fanatics, this is for you!

Cons: 
- No Online
- Clearly lacks in content, Arcade and VS modes only. Nothing else in the menu.
- Wish the game was more user-friendly instead of having the player being so rudely thrown into the game.

Absolutely recommending this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198103090723', 'num_games_owned': 3001, 'num_reviews': 344, 'playtime_forever': 536, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 506, 'last_played': 1464585338}
review:
Yes, another 2d fighter on steam.  
Oh wait, another 2d fighter on steam.

Game:
A loli 2d fighter .... that's about it

Pro:
Low min spec
Fluid
No issues on Win7 
Steam cards
Stupid but funny premis
Fair number of characters to play though
Local Co-op

Con:
Silly premis if your not a 12 year old boy
Pay DLCs that for what it gives you should be free
Says Steam Workshop but I can't see it ... and I'm not sure I would want to
Shifts from freaking easy to freaking hard very very quickly
Lolis kicked my ass
The 2nd character doesn't help unless your co-op or have better skills than me (which is probably true)
Only arcade mode and versus
No training

If you want a sailor moon 2d fighter get this.  
If you want a good 2d fighter, look elsewhere.

author: {'steamid': '76561197975028311', 'num_games_owned': 1097, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1419076825}
review:
I'd be willing to ignore how filthy some of the naked ca 10 yo girls make me feel, if the game was technically good, but it really isn't.
I think the biggest problem is that the full screen mode doesn't work. It makes both the aspect ratio and the colours warped in a completely unexpected manner. You can resize the window but it doesn't hold the aspect ratio and I get headaches when trying to concentrate on distorted motion especially if it's fast. Even then you still lose the screen real estate the border takes up. I ended up having to use a third party software to blow up the window.
Secondly, the keyboard and gamepad are rebindable, but they use different labels in the dialog box to what they use in the combo screen and those won't reflect your changes anyway so they might as well not given you the option.
Do you want to play using you gamepad's D-pad? Tough luck, it's not THAT rebindable. It's probably easier to play this game on keyboard because it seems to have been designed with a 6 button Sega gamepad in mind, a very relevant decision in today's market, right? There are some combos that are virtually impossible to pull off with an analogue stick. It's a lot of pain to navingate the menus with thumbsticks and no deadzones at all.
To exit mid game you have to push all face buttons and "START". Notice the quotes because "pressing START" in reality means pressing the right analog stick. Yeah, and by the way it never worked for me for some reason.
Supposedly you can activate a practice mode, but my read on the vague hint on the pause screen is that you are just supposed to press the button for P2 in VS Mode. With no way to review your combos in game, this is incredibly weak. The AI uses combos to beat your pretty ass right from the start unlike in better fighting games that ease you into it.

I think you'd be much better off browsing a hentai website and sticking with competent fighers.
